description: Back row players transition to attack with setter playing in right back.  If setter plays 1st ball then the left back player will set the middle back player.
behaviors: Load to approach, lead the hitter

name: Back Row v Front Row
focus: Work on attacking out of the back row.
description: 1st ball is attacked out the back row.  After the 1st attack players can attack on the net.
behaviors: Lead hitter, land in front of 10' line, focus on finish

name: Back Row Points - Front Row Possession
focus: Work on attacking from back row and decision making of back row attacks
description: Two teams competing with teams getting possesion of the ball from front row attacks and only scoring from back row attacks.
scoring: Points for kills from back row
behaviors: Lead hitter, load up to attack, finish parrallel and snapped

name: Back Row Bomber
focus: Work on serve receive, attacking from the back row and defending back row attacks.
description: Two teams competing off a serve.  Each team gets one back row attacker.
behaviors: Load approach, lead hitter, long swing

name: +1 or +2
focus: Work on attacking from the front or back row.
description: Teams of 3 hitters and a setter can attack from the front or back row.  If teams score from back row they get 2 points.  If they score from front row they get 1 point.
scoring: 1 point for front row kill, 2 points for back row kill
behaviors: Lead hitters, transition to attack, stratgize

name: Rainbows
focus: Work on attacking and defending back row attacks with an overloaded defense.
description: Two teams competing with 5 back row attackers designated with lanes.
behaviors: Setter call set, stay in your lane, lead the hitter

name: 1 v 2
focus: Pass-set-hit contacts with control
description: 1 player / 2 player sides.  Players must perform the defined actions to level up.
behaviors: Various depending on the level.  Be specific for each level (try and have one new one per level)

name: 10=X
focus: Playing with precision and focus on technique
description: Back row ball control.  Players have 10 balls to get X number of digs.  In order for their to be a dig there must be an attack.
behaviors: Dig high, finish to defender, lead the hitter, retreat on set, load up to attack.

name: 2 v 2 Ball Control
focus: Pass-set-hit contacts with control
description: Under set parameters players pass-set-attack.
behaviors: Dig high, big step off net,

name: Short Court - Pass, set, tip
focus: Communication, transition, off speed attacking
description: Within the 10' line boundaries players pass-set-tip to other team
behaviors: Dig high and move, contact at highest point, block and turn

name: Short Court - Pass, set, roll shot
focus: Communication, transition, off speed attacking
description: Within the 10' line boundaries players pass-set-roll shot to other team
behaviors: Dig high and move, finish high snap, block and turn

name: Full Court - Pass, set, tip
focus: Communication, transition, off speed attacking
description: Using full court (half) players pass-set-tip to each other
behaviors: Dig high and move, contact at highest point, block and turn

name: Full Court - Pass, set, roll shot
focus: Communication, transition, off speed attacking
description: Using full court (half) players pass-set-roll shot to each other
behaviors: Dig high and move, finish high snap, block and turn

name: Full Court - Pass, set hit
focus: Communication, transition, controlled attacking and digging
description: Using full court (half) players pass-set-hit to each other
behaviors: Dig high and move, finish to defender, block and turn

name: Back Court - Pass, set, tip
focus: Communication, transition (retreating to get full approach in), off speed attacking
description: Using back row attacks players pass-set-tip to each other
behaviors: Dig high, retreat to load, lead attacker, push to target

name: Back Court - Pass, set, roll shot
focus: Communication, transition (retreating to get full approach in), off speed attacking
description: Using back row attacks players pass-set-roll shot to each other
behaviors: Dig high, retreat to load, lead attacker, finish high snap

name: Back Court - Pass, set, hit
focus: Communication, transition (retreating to get full approach in), off speed attacking
description: Using back row attacks players pass-set-attack to each other
behaviors: Dig high, retreat to load, finish to defender, block and turn

name: 2 x 2 Communication Drill
focus: Controlling ball and communicating
description: 4 groups of two, must pass-set-hit (or down ball) over, after third contact group runs to the right around.
behaviors: Dig High, Call set early, finish to defender, run

name: 3 x 3 Communication Drill
focus: Controlling ball and communicating
description: 4 groups of two, must pass-set-hit (or down ball) over, after third contact group runs to the right around.  Each player only gets one contact.
behaviors: Dig High, Call set early, finish to defender, run

name: 2-Blue Ball Control
focus: Pass-set-hit contacts focusing on outside set and back row attack
description: 5 players on a side (no middle front), setter can either set outside or back row attack for right back player.
behaviors: Dig High, Call set early, finish to defender, load for attack

name: 2-Bic Ball Control
focus: Pass-set-hit contacts focusing on outside set and back row attack
description: 5 players on a side (no middle front), setter can either set outside or back row attack for middle back player.  BiC is a faster offensive option.
behaviors: Dig High, Call set early, finish to defender, load for attack

name: 2 Person Down Ball Around The World
focus: Work on passing-setting and hitting controlled down balls.
description: 2 players on each side, with group of 2 on each side waiting off the court.  Groups pass-set and hit a controlled down ball cross court.  After hitter ball over the group rotates counter clockwise to the other position.
behaviors: Ready position, dig high, feet to ball

name: 3-2-1 Ball Control
focus: Work on controlling the ball with different #'s of contacts
description: 2 teams of 2 players on each side, cooperating to score points.  Teams must get 3 contacts (pass-set-hit) then 2 contacts (pass-hit) and then 1 hit without ball touching ground to score a point.
scoring: 1 point for each time through script

name: 4 v 4 FR/BR
focus: Pass-set-hit contacts with a lot of movement
description: 4 players on each side, when attacking they are in the front row, when defending they are in the back row.
behaviors: Dig high, retreat to base, finish to defender

name: Back Row Elimination
focus: Back row attacking and defending with some pressure
description: 4 players on a side, setter in front row with 3 back row players.  If a player makes a hitting error they are eliminated.  Continue until only one attacker remains.
behaviors: Dig High, Call set early, finish to defender, load for attack

name: BiC - Downball BC
focus: Back row defense and ball control.
description: 5 players on a side, set BiC (back row attack from middle), hitter hits down ball over.
behaviors: Feet to ball, release on set, dig high

name: Cross Court Ball Control
focus: Base release movements, decision making and cooperation
description: Outside hitter attacks cross court and keeps ball in play
behaviors: Dig high, set ball off and in, finish to defender, good set/bad set decision

name: Back Row Go Stay
focus: Ball control, communication
description: 4 players on each side, 3 back row and a setter at the net.  If a wing player attacks ball they must switch with middle back.
behaviors: Dig high, talk about switches, set stability

name: Defensive Prep Ball Control
focus: Work on defending attackers in prepartion for competition
description: Defenive side is given game plan for defending hitters or playsets (OH,MH,RS),  Defense must move to correct defensive positions.
behaviors: See set, release, ready position

name: Dig and Swing
focus: Work on digging and attacking with control.
description: Two players per side, one setter at the net and a digger/hitter in middle back.  Teams must pass set and hit cooperatively to reach goal.
behaviors: Dig high, finish to middle back, transition to attack

name: Flip Ball Control
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Two groups of 3, one on each half court. Group must pass, set and attack.  Once a player contacts the ball the must run to other side of net.  The group is attempting to keep ball in play and count net crosses without the ball hitting ground.
behaviors: Contact and go, dig high, talk to hitter

name: Half Court Ping Pong Ball Control
focus: Ball control
description: One contact to hit the ball over the net, player must run to other side after playing ball.

name: Half Court Competition
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Half court, 2 v 2 with groups off waiting to switch.  Pass-set-hit, when ball crosses net team that played ball must rotate off.  Must get to set number of points.  Competing against other half.
behaviors: Dig hig, talk to hitter

name: In and Out Ball Control
focus: Work in switching between in and out of system offense.
description: Two teams of 5, working cooperatively to reach goal.  Teams must switch between in and out of system.  Teams get extra contacts for out of system attacks.
scoring: Contacts w/ bonus for out of system attacks

name: Juggle to Attack
focus: Work on differnent types of contacts and transitioning to attacking.
description: Coach hits a player and starts off a dig.  Player must execute a series of contacts to themself, set then attack over the net.
behaviors: Vary depending on contacts

name: Left Right Release Off Back Row Attacks
focus: Work on attacking and defending back row attacks.
description: Two sides working cooperatively.  Middle back releases left or right on set.  Back row attacker must hit ball to them.
scoring: Make a move, talk to hitter, finish to defender
behaviors: Contacts, net crosses, digs

name: Line Hitting Ball Control
focus: Base release movements, decision making and cooperation
description: Outside hitter attacks line and keeps the ball in play.
behaviors: Dig high, set ball out to pin, finish line, good set/bad set decision

name: Rotation Defense Variation
focus: Base release movements, decision making and cooperation
description: Outside hitter attacks line and keeps the ball in play against a rotation defense

name: LMR Off Blocker Defense BC
focus: Work on off blocker defense.
description: Teams of 6 attack and defend using off blockers from all 3 hitting positions.
behaviors: Make a move, turn and cover, dig high

name: Middle Back Release Ball Control
focus: Middle back defense
description: Teams of 4 with an outside and a right side hitter.  Attackers hit controlled balls to middle back players.
behaviors: Dig high, release, finish to defender

name: Middle Transition Ball Control
focus: Work on middles attacking in transition
description: Team of six defends off speed attacks and generates middle attacks
behaviors: Hit floor to make play, big first step, be available

name: Musical Volleyball
focus: Work on ball control and competition.
description: Ball is entered with music playing, teams cooperate until music stops, when music stops teams compete.  Whoever wins rally gets point.

name: Off Blocker Defense Ball Control
focus: Work on playing off blocker defense and attacking sharp angles.
description: Setter can set outside or right side.  Attackers must hit to off blockers.
behaviors: Make a move, dig high, off the net not along the net

name: On Off 3's Ball Control
focus: Work on ball control and communication.
description: 12 players with 3 people in each quadrant of the court.  After contact player must go off on their side, player on other half can come on the the court.

name: Out of System BC
focus: Work on out of system offense and defense.
description: Teams of 5 cooperating.  Attacks should be made to setter so team must run out of system offense.
behaviors: Finish to setter, dig high, feet to ball

name: Outside Rightside Down Ball Dig
focus: Work on base release movements off a pass-set.
description: Free or down ball to passer.  Set to Outside or Right Side.  Hitter hits a down ball.  Defense starts in base and makes move on set.  Play out to dig.
behaviors: Base, release on set, get seet, dig high

name: Partner Juggling
focus: Work on different types of contacts.
description: Two players execute different types of contacts.
behaviors: Vary depending on contacts

name: Partner Juggle to Attack Over Net
focus: Work on different types of contacts and constraints.
description: Two players execute different types of contacts and then attack over the net.  Players are attempting to keep ball in play.
behaviors: Vary depending on contacts

name: Pipe Ball Control
focus: Back row attacking and defending
description: One attacker in back row in middle back with setter at net.  Players must pass set and attack to other team.
behaviors: Dig high, lead hitter, load up to attack

name: Repped Coverage BC
focus: Work in hitter coverage and transition attacking from coverage.
description: Team of 6 receives a free ball.  Team pass-set-hits, when the hit is made a coverage ball is tossed over the net.  Team must pass-set-hit repeatedly attempting to reach goal of attacks with one ball.
behaviors: Follow set, get low, keep space

name: Rightside to Swing Defense BC
focus: Work on defending and transitioning to attack for Right Side hitters.
description: Right side attacker tip or rolls ball to right front defender who must transition and attack.
behaviors: Dig high, Get off net, Call for set

name: Rotating 4s
focus: Attacking and defending outside hitters.
description: Two teams of 4 players with 2 in front row and 2 in back row.  RF player is the setter and always sets OH.  Teams rotate when ball goes over the net.

name: Rotation Tip-Tip
focus: Defending tips and transitioning
description: Outside attackers tips behind block to defender, keep in play.
behaviors: Dig high in front of setter, transition back, tip up

name: Self Pass-Set-Down Ball Two Ball BC
focus: Work on controling the ball
description: 4 players start on court.  Two lines on each half of the court.  Players must pass-set and hit a downball over the net.  After hitting ball over players rotate.
behaviors: Dig high, set high, feet to ball, hold finish

name: Scripted Ball Control
focus: Playing with precision and focus on technique
description: Groups of players must work together to perform a specific script.
behaviors: Various depending on the script and focus of the script. Execution of the script should be a part of the scoring.

name: Shot Defense Ball Control
focus: Work on attacking and defending specific shots or areas.
description: Two teams work together to generate pre set attacks to reach a goal.
behaviors: Talk about shots, big first step off net, dig high

name: Tag Team Switch
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Teams pass-set-and hit ball over.  After every contacts players must switch with teammates on end line.

name: Half Court Variation
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Teams pass-set-and hit ball over on half court.  After every contact players must switch with teammates on end line.

name: Cross Court Variation
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Teams pass-set-and hit ball over on half court with teams playing diagonal to each other.  After every contact players must switch with teammates on end line.

name: Setter Stay Variation
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Teams pass-set-and hit ball over on half court with teams playing diagonal to each other.  After every contact players must switch with teammates on end line except for setter.

name: 1st / 3rd Contact Variation
focus: Ball control, communication
description: Teams pass-set-and hit ball over on half court with teams playing diagonal to each other.  After either the 1st or 3rd contact players switch with teammate on endline.

name: Take Setter Out Ball Control
focus: Work on attacking to setter and playing out of system.
description: Teams attempt to keep ball in play while attacking at the setter.
scoring: Points for setter contacts on first ball.  Goal of points with 1 ball
behaviors: Where is the setter, approach to attack setter, dig to middle

name: Three Person Ball Control
focus: Down ball / armswing and ball control
description: One person on each side of the net (half court) with a 'setter' that goes under the net for both sides.  Players must pass set and attack over the net and keep the ball in play.
behaviors: Dig high, feet to ball, lead hitter, transition to defend

name: Three Touch Ball Control
focus: Ball control, effort, creativity
description: One person on each side of the net (half court), players must pass to themselves, set themselves and attack over the net.  After they attack they must switch off the court with another player filling thier position.  Repeat until a goal is reached.  Half courts can compete against each other.
behaviors: Dig high, set in front of yourself, talk to hitter

name: Team Defense to Middle Attack
focus: Work on running middles in transition
description: Team set up in defense.  Outside or right side hitter self tosses and gives an off speed attack.  Defense must defend and run a middle attack.
behaviors: Dig high, be available, use space

name: Team Down Ball Ball Control
focus: Down ball / armswing
description: Teams of 3 + a setter on both sides.  Players pass, set and give down balls over the net.
behaviors: Feet to ball, finish long, lead attacker

name: Tip Back Coverage BC
focus: Hitter coverage
description: Team of six, passes-set-approaches, hitter tips back to players in hitter coverage.
behaviors: Creep and cover, cover high

name: Tipped Ball Control Coverage
focus: Work on hitter coverage play off the block.
description: Team of 6 with 3 blockers on boxes.  Team of 6 pass-sets and tips ball into block.  Block redirects ball to allow for coverage players to play ball.
scoring: Contacts, coverage plays, sets of attacks (1 for each hitter)
behaviors: Follow set, get low, platform out

name: Tip and Rotate
focus: Work on tip coverage and defensive movements.
description: Team pass, set and tip over the net cooperating with other side to reach goal.  When ball goes over the net teams rotate.
scoring: Contacts, Net Crosses, Tip, Digs, Full Rotations
behaviors: Tip over, move to spot, dig high

name: 6 v 6 Tip Ball Control
focus: Ball control, off speed attacking
description: 6 on 6 with attackers only using off speed attacks, teams work together to achieve goal
behaviors: Tip over, dig high

name: Blocking 1 v 2
focus: Focus on closing blocks to outside
description: Free ball to passer, set outside or right side.  Blocker attempts to touch ball.
behaviors: Start balanced, make a read, explosive movement

name: Block Move and Pass
focus: Focus on blocking moves and plays off the block.
description: Blocker makes a hard move, grabs ball and flips it behind.  Passer passes to target.
behaviors: Stay ready, shoot to ball

name: Block Move Pass and Hit
focus: Focus on blocking moves and plays off the block.
description: Blocker makes hard move tossing ball to passer.  Blocker then transitions to hit ball from setter.
behaviors: Hard move, big first step

name: Middle Block Move Pass and Hit
focus: Focus on block moves for MIddles
description: Middle Blocker makes hard moves to the left or right tossing ball to the passer.
behaviors: First step, press, thumbs up

name: 2 v 2 Blocking
focus: Read set and make hard moves
description: Outside and right side attacker vs. two blockers.  Attack off a free ball pass and set.  Blockers attempt to get a double block as much as possible.  If single block second blocker must cover for tips

name: Double Middle / RS
focus: Work on double blocking the middle with left front player and defending the right side.
description: Start with left front player help blocking for the quick.  Toss on or off the net.  If toss is off left front will move base out to block the right side.
behaviors: See the pass, commit on 3 passes, move out on 2s

name: Free Ball Block Moves
focus: Work on block moves and setting blocks.
description: Free ball to attacking side.  Pass and set to hitters.  Go in pre set order.  Blockers attempts to block hitters.
behaviors: Ready position, eye work, hard moves

name: Fronting Hitter
focus: Read approach and front hitter
description: Two players, one is blocker and one is attacker.  Attacker starts approach.  Blocker moves to take the line of their approach.  Hitter jumps and lands.  Blocker jumps with attacker.  Repeat for set number of reps.  Attacker should vary approaches.  Switch roles.
behaviors: See line of approach, cut off hitter.  Hands on hitting shoulder.

name: Front hitter w/ Self Toss
focus: Read approach and front hitter
description: Two players, one is blocker and one is attacker.  Attacker starts tosses a ball for attack.  Blocker finds line of approach.  Attacker hits ball.  Blocker attempts to touch ball.  Repeat for set number.  Switch roles.
behaviors: See line of approach, eyes on attacker

name: Get out of the hole
focus: Making hard moves and pressing over
description: Two hitters on boxes with one blocker.  Blocker must move between hitters and block them.  Set # of blocks to get out of drill.
behaviors: Make a hard move, press, thumbs up, full extentsion, recover

name: Net Decision
focus: Making decisions and plays at the net on overpasses.
description: Tosser on the 10' line feeds balls to blocker.
behaviors: Ready position, hit the pass, swipe, move off

name: Reach and Bounce
focus: Blocking footwork and penetrating
description: Blockers start in blocking base, blockers make moves and jump, reach over the net and grab balls from players standing on boxes.  After they grab balls they pull them over the net and bounce the ball off the ground behind them.
behaviors: Hard moves, reach and surround

name: Read Hitter Blind Blocker
focus: Focus on hitter
description: Tosser gives ball to hitter from behind blocker.  Blocker must read hitter approach and attempt to block ball.
behaviors: Front hitter, find approach

name: RS 31-High Out
focus: Work on the decision to help block with middle and block outside for right front blocker
description: Setter, middle and outside.  If middle runs an A (31) then RS helps block.  If middle does not run an A RS adjusts block for OH.
behaviors: See the approach, shuffle, hard moves

name: The Wall
focus: Work on blocking back row attacks
description: 3 blockers vs 3 back row attackers
behaviors: Wait, Block over, stay in shoulders

name: Touch game
focus: Setting good blocks and getting touches at the net
description: 3 blockers v 3 hitters (+ lib for free balls and setter), give free balls and count touches
behaviors: Press, thumbs up, hard moves, full extension

name: Too Far
focus: Work on recovery blocks to left side
description: Middle blocker start blocking base in must close or set good block to defend outside attack
behaviors: Push off first step, press over

name: One Contact
focus: Serve and pass repetitions
description: Butterfly with a serve and pass contact

name: Two Contact
focus: Serve, pass and set repetitions
description: Butterfly with a serve, pass and set

name: Three Contact
focus: Serve, pass, set, attack repetitions
description: Butterfly with a serve, pass and attack (tip, roll or swing)

name: Four Contact
focus: Serve, pass, set, attack and block repetitions
description: Butterfly with a serve, pass attack and block

name: Five Contact
focus: Serve, pass, set, attack, block and defend repetitions
description: Butterfly with a serve, pass, attack, block and defend

name: Blocking Butterfly Prep
focus: Work on blocking strategy for opponents.
description: Hitters attack off a free ball pass.  Blockers execute preset strategy for each hitter or play set.
behaviors: Ready position, see set, hard move

name: Cross Court Serving Butterfly
focus: Work on serving and passing serves from cross court.
description: Servers start cross court from passer and serve.  Players execute the butterfly from there.

name: Out of System Butterfly
focus: Work on out of system setting and attacking.
description: Butterfly with a down ball to a defender in right back, a set and an attack.
behaviors: Dig high, 5 x 5, see the set

name: Self Toss and Hit Butterfly
focus: Work on defending and attacking in transition.
description: Butterfly initiated by a self toss from a hitter where a hitter attacks off a dig.
behaviors: Dig high, get to starting spot

name: Transition Butterfly
focus: Work on transition attacking.
description: Teams defend an attack and trasition to attack.
behaviors: Dig high, find your spot, approach to swing

name: Free Ball Passing Butterfly
focus: Work on free ball passing
description: Butterfly initiated by a free ball
behaviors: Platform out, pass with legs, hold angle

name: Run Through Butterfly
focus: Work on run throughs for different paths and angles.
description: Butterfly with defenders executing run throughts to play the ball.
behaviors: Platform out, hips hunder ball, move through

name: Speed Butterfly
focus: Work on pass-set-attack with tempo
description: Butterfly with balls entered quickly (when setter contacts the ball)

name: Three Person Block Butterfly
focus: Work on blocking vs outside and right side hitters
description: Butterfly with players attacking from the left and right and block setting blocks against the hitters
behaviors: Ready position, thumbs up, press over

name: 6 v 4 in 10'
focus: Encourage attackers to work on different shots under constraint of 10' line boundary
description: 6 side receives serves, 4 side serves.  4 side must only defend the area inside the 10' line.
behaviors: Wide angles, find hands,tip up and down.

name: 6 v 8
focus: Work on attacking against a full defense.
description: Two teams compete.  One team uses 8 players on defense playing behind the block to take away off speed attacks.

name: 15  v 15
focus: Work on playing on the constraints of a smaller court.
description: Two teams compete with a boundary of 15' (half court) endline.
behaviors: Use angles, find hands, find space

name: Court Cut Off
focus: Changing the area of the court to encourage or discourage behaviors.
description: Two teams competing with areas of the court designated as out of bounds.

name: Half Court - Cross Court
focus: Develop offense and defense to the cross court.
description: Two teams compete with the line area shut off to attacks (out of bounds).

name: Half Court - Right Side / Left Side
focus: Develop offense and defense against certain areas of the court.
description: Two teams compete with defined areas of the courts shut off (out of bounds).

name: Short Court
focus: Develop offense and defense versus a shorter court.
description: Two teams compete on a shorter court (27' or 25')

name: Error Game
focus: Compete under constraints that increase weight of errors.
description: Two teams compete with errors counting as +2 points for other team.

name: Floor is Lava
focus: Compete under constraint of area of court a defender can not go into.
description: Two teams compete.  Mark off area of the court.  Players can not enter into this area while defending.  If they do they lose the point.
scoring: Points, stepping in lava is point for other team.

name: Net Adjustments
focus: Changing the area along the net the players can attack.
description: Two teams competing with areas of the net shut off for attacking.

name: Pins In
focus: Develop offense and defense under constraints.
description: Two teams compete with the antennae moved in along the net and players must attack inside the antennae.  (2 ft, 3 ft, 5 ft)

name: Splits
focus: Develop offense and defense under constraints.
description: Two teams compete with additional antennae used inside.  Players must attack between the outer antennae (middle of the net is closed)

name: LS v RS / RS v LS
focus: Develop offense and defense under constraints.
description: Two teams compete with a single antennae in the middle of the net added.  Teams must attack on one designated side (either left or right)

name: Thottled
focus: Work on forcing attacks to hitters besides the Outside Hitter.
description: Two teams compete.  Outside hitter can not swing, they may only use off speed attacks.

name: Wait for it
focus: Work on off speed attacking and defending.
description: Two teams compete.  The first attack for both teams must be an off speed attack.

name: 1-2 and 3
focus: Competing with constraints on contacts.
description: Two teams of 4 competing.  Starting off an underhard serve the receiving team only gets 1 contact, the next possession gets 2 contacts and the next possession gets 3 contacts.
behaviors: Talk about contacts, find space, talk about space

name: 2 v 3
focus: Competing against adversity.
description: Teams compete, one side starts with 2 players, one side with 3 players.  After set amount of time switch who has 2 and who has 3.
behaviors: Find space, talk about space

name: 2 v 3 Wave
focus: Competing against adversity.
description: Serving side is team of 2, receiving side is team of 3.  Serve and play out.  If 3 side wins they score a point, if 2 side wins they go to three side and 2 players wave out.
behaviors: Serve to space, push to pin, fill the space

name: 4 v 4 Rotation Ping Pong
focus: Work on playing in chaos and controlling the ball
description: Two teams of 4 competing against each other with each team only getting one contact per side.  After team plays ball over the net they must rotate.
behaviors: Rotate quickly, ready and react, find space

name: 5 v 5 w/ Middles Front Row
focus: Competing under constraints, forcing middles
description: Set up with setter, middle in front row and three back row players, setters can either set middle or back row.

name: 5's with Double on 1st Attack
focus: Competing w/out middles
description: Two teams competing with 2 players in front row and 3 in back row.  Set up so 1st attack is against a double block.  Play out points.
behaviors: Recognize the block, attack around

name: 5 v 5 OH Only
focus: Competing with outsides against an overloaded defense
description: Off a down ball.  Two teams compete with an overloaded defense with only outsides attacking.
behaviors: Find a seam, swing to score, big first step off

name: 6 v 2 v 2
focus: Competing with different structures
description: Team of 6 serving to 2 teams of 2 on half courts.  If serving side wins then they score a point and rotate.  If 2 side wins they replace 2 players.
behaviors: Pass first, find a swing, attack space

name: 6 v 3
focus: Competing at a disadvantage
description: 3 players on one side, 6 players on other, 3 side gets first ball, if they win they score if they lose they wave off (in groups of three)

name: 6 v 4
focus: Competing at an advantage or disadvantage
description: Team of 6 competing against a Team of 4.  Multiple versions for points and point scoring.

name: Cheese Ball
focus: Work on scoring points in uncoventional means.
description: Teams competing.  Points can only be scored off a free ball pass contact.  Team that wins rally receives the next ball.
behaviors: Be eviil, find space, attack when weak.

name: Fast 4's
focus: Competing with hitters and setters.
description: Play 4 v 4 with servers on end line.  Limit time between points (count) and give next serve.

name: Fast 5's
focus: Competing with an offense
description: Play 5 v 5 (no middles) with servers on end line.  Limit time between points (count) and give next serve.

name: Four Square
focus: Competing and developing a strategy within the rules of the game
description: Break court up into 4 'squares' with a team in each square (extra teams waiting by the 4 squate), if ball lands in square they are out, if they make an error they are out, only 3 contacts on their side, ball must go up if it goes into the other square on their side of the net.
scoring: Points for 1 square team for winning
behaviors: Be evil, always be advancing

name: FR/BR vs. 6
focus: Competing with a front row and a back row attacking
description: Enter with a serve to 3 side.  One hitter designated as front row or back row (for whole point).  Play out for points.
behaviors: Pass first, lead hitter, find a mismatch

name: Half Court Doubles Queens
focus: Competing and doing all skills
description: Teams of two compete with winners advancing to receiving side or staying.  Divide the court in half.

name: Inside 10' line only
focus: Competing with a focus on attacking and defending off sped attacks in a confined space.
description: Play within the boundaries of the 10' line. Players can attack fully if they want, but the boundaries will make that more difficult.

name: Full court, off speed only
focus: Competing with a focus on attacking and defending off speed attacks
description: Using full (half) court and only off speed attacks.

name: Full court, no offspeed inside 10' line
focus: Competing with a focus on full attacks.
description: Using full (half) court, players can not use off speed attacks that would land inside the 10' line.

name: Full court, anything goes
focus: Competing with no constraints.
description: Using full (half) court, players can use any attack.

name: Deep court only
focus: Competing with constraint of inside the 10' line is out of bounds.
description: Using only the area behind the 10' line as in bounds.  Players can still attack at the net.  They can still block, but if it lands inside the 10' line off the block it is out.

name: Lions Choice
focus: Competing under constraints of front row / back row
description: Two teams competing in 3 v 3 with one hitter designated for back row attacking and one designated for front row.
behaviors: Dig high, lead hitters, load to attack

name: Monkeys in the Middle
focus: Competing while controlling the ball.
description: 2 teams of 4 compete.  1 group of 4 passes-sets and hits down balls to over the net.  Group of 4 attempts to touch ball to disrupt.

name: Random #'s Game
focus: Competing in different team types.
description: Roll dice, dice determines # of people that are on the court.  Start off serve, free ball or down ball.   Play point out.  Roll for every point.

name: Reduction
focus: Competiing at an advantage or a disadvantage
description: 2 teams competing starting in 6 v 6.  Coach enters balls off a free ball.  When a team scores off first free ball they lose a player.  If team can when with only 2 players they score a big point.
scoring: Big point for scoring with only two players
behaviors: Nail free ball pass, call loud, swing to score

name: Red Rover
focus: Competing with chaos
description: 2 teams of 6 competing.  When a player attacks (in front row or back row) they must switch with their opposite player.
behaviors: Attack and move, find a mis match, protect your front row.

name: Double Random #'s Game
focus: Competing in different team types.
description: Roll two dice, teams get the # of people on their die.  Lower # of people gets to serve.

name: Red-White-Blue
focus: Back row attacking and defending
description: 3 back row players and a setter at the net.  Only running back row attacks.  Play out points.
behaviors: Dig high, load up to attack, lead hitters, finish parrallel

name: Team Queens
focus: Competing and eliminating
description: Each sides starts with 3+ teams of 2.  Play out point off a serve.  Team that loses point is eliminated.  Continue until a side runs out of teams.
scoring: Big point for having teams left
behaviors: Serve to space, dig high, talk about space

name: Warlords
focus: Competing and eliminating
description: 4 teams on a divided court. If team loses rally witht he ball touching their court or for an error they get a point.  When team reaches goal of points they are eliminated and remaining teams continue.  If 2 teams on same side are left one team switches sides.
behaviors: Be evil, stay ready, recover high

name: Wave Game
focus: Competing with a large number of players to keep pace high and players involved
description: 6 on 6 with extra players on end line.  After each point the losing team waves (front row goes off, fill from back row)

name: 1 Pass Defense
focus: Defending out of system offense
description: Start play with a simulated one pass, defense sets up early in one pass defense, play out for winner.
scoring: Points, bonus points for winning / defending first ball?
behaviors: Call out pass, set block early, dig high

name: 1 Pass / 2 Pass / 3 Pass
focus: Work on adjusting defense to the quality of the pass.
description: Toss ball from end line to simulate different quality of passes.  Defense adjusts based on the the pass.
behaviors: Read pass, make move, commit/no commit

name: 2nd Chance Dig to Transition
focus: Work on defensive situations
description: Enter ball with free or down ball.  When team scores off a kill, give defender a 2nd chance to continue play.
behaviors: Ready position, stay square, dig high

focus: Work on defensive coverage and attacking.
description: Box off an area of the court.  Put defender in box (give them a starting position).  Hitter on box attempts to hit balls into the box that defender can not control.
scoring: Points for digs / points for hitting into the box
behaviors: Ready position, finish through ball

name: Big Mistake Drill
focus: Defending without a block
description: Start with free / down ball, blockers move to front hitters but do not jump.  Points are banked. Teams collect points when they dig and score in transition.
behaviors: Be set, hands ready, dig high

name: Bounce to Run Down
focus: Work on range and contacts on the move.
description: Defender starts and middle back and coach hits ball into ground toward one of the corners.  Defender must play ball before it hits ground off the bounce.
behaviors: Ready position, turn and go, platform to ball first

name: Cross Court Digging
focus: Digging balls and communication.
description: Defenders dig balls hit cross court.
behaviors: Base, release, ready postion, dig high

name: Hit on Box Variation
focus: Digging balls from hitters on boxes.
description: Hitters on boxes hit balls cross court to defenders.
behaviors: Base, release, ready postion, dig high

name: 2 Defender Varitaion
focus: Digging balls with multiple defenders.
description: Hitters hit to two defenders (one wing and middle back)
behaviors: Base, release, ready postion, dig high

name: Defensive Movement Footwork
focus: Movements for defense
description: Base release movements with or without emergency techniques
behaviors: Ready position, move tight, eyes on attacker

name: Dig and Go
focus: Dig move and recover.
description: Three defenders dig balls and touch the end line before diggning again.
behaviors: Dig high, Ready Position

name: Dig and Cover
focus: Digging balls hit cross court and recovering to cover hitter.
description: Defenders dig balls and move to cover.
behaviors: Dig high, creep in

name: Hitter on Box Variation
focus: Work on base release movements and digging balls hit cross court.
description: Wing defenders release to dig and then play a coverage ball.
behaviors: Dig high, creep in, lift

name: 3 Defender Cover Variation
focus: Work on base release movements, defender area coverage, and hitter coverage.
description: Wing defenders and middle back release to dig and then play a coverage ball.
behaviors: Dig high, creep in, lift

name: Dig and Move
focus: Digging balls and communication.
description: Group of three defenders dig cross court balls and run around a cone on the end line.
behaviors: Dig high, Ready Position

name: Hit on Box Variation
focus: Digging balls and communication.
description: Group of three defenders dig cross court balls hit from boxes around a cone on the end line.
behaviors: Dig high, Ready Position

name: Line Hitting Varation
focus: Digging balls and communication.
description: Group of three defenders dig line balls and run around a cone on the end line.
behaviors: Dig high, Ready Position

name: Down Ball Digging
focus: Hitting and digging down balls
description: Lines of players hitting and digging down balls
behaviors: Feet to ball, topspin, dig high

name: Cross Court Variation
focus: Hitting and digging down balls cross court.
description: Butterfly of players hitting down balls cross court.

name: Dig Move and Dig
focus: Work on digging moving and working with another defender
description: 2 Defenders dig and switch sides of the court to dig another ball.
behaviors: Read and Ready, dig high, dig to ground

name: Down Ball Ball Control Variation
focus: Down balls, ball control and communication.
description: 2 groups of 2 players digging and hitting down balls on 2nd contact.

name: Over net dig set down ball
Over net dig and down ball
Emergency Technique Footwork
focus: Movements for emergency situations with a focus on playing the ball
description: Step Collapse, Punch over the shoulder, sprawl forward, turn and run
behaviors: Big step, hold platform,uppercut punch

name: Go Stay
focus: Defense and communication
description: 3 players playing defense with one person hitting balls to them from their side of the net.  If attacker hits to middle player every one stay, if attacker hits to a wing defender the middle defender switches with them.  Players must dig balls so attacker can get to it.
behaviors: Ready position, move tight, dig high

name: Mat Defense
focus: Work on defense contacts and effort with constraints.
description: Player is on their knees on the mat.  Coach tosses balls and player must keep balls from touching the matt.
scoring: Time,X # of balls touched, balls into a target
behaviors: Ready position, touch everything, recover

name: Mat Digging
focus: Work on defensive contacts and platform range.
description: Player starts on knees on mat.  Coach hits ball to defender.  Player must dig ball from kneeling position.
behaviors: Shoulders forward, shoot to ball, dig high

name: Middle of Court Defense Communication
focus: Work on commpunication and execution of middle defense.
description: Middle blocker signals 5 or 1 (what zone they are taking away).  Middle on other side of net attacks.  Middle blocker takes away area they called, middle back player defends the opposite area.
behaviors: Drop and press left/right, Step away to ready

name: Middle of Floor Defense For Liberos
focus: Defending the middle of the court from left back defender.
description: 3 hitters on boxes attack the middle of the floor (boxed off area) libero must defense from their defensive position.
behaviors: Ready position, hips under ball, dig high

name: Off Speed Defense
focus: Work on defending off speed attacks.
description: Hitter on box, defender on floor.  Boxes tapes onto floor.  Hitter hits and tips.  If ball lands in box then defender gets a point.  Low score wins.
behaviors: Ready position, explode to ball, dig high

name: On 2 Def to Transition
focus: Work on defending setter attacks and transition attacks.
description: Setter attacks, defenders dig and run transition attack to outside.
behaviors: Hold base, platform out, dig high

name: PSHd
focus: Defending specific attacks
description: Pass-set-attack chain with a defender
scoring: Points for defending in system balls
behaviors: Various depending on the type of attack and location of defense.

name: Release on Set
focus: Seeing a set and releasing to defensive positions.
description: Defensive team on one side, setter passer on other.  Free ball to passer, setter sets one of the three positions.  Defenders release to their defensive positions when they see the set.  Blockers move but do not jump.
behaviors: Ready position, release on set, stay tight, ready again

name: Self Toss and Defend
focus: Focus on looking at attacker on defense
description: 3 hitters against backrow defense.  Hitters self toss and attack from each of the hitting zones.  Defenders release and attempt to dig ball.
behaviors: Find hitter, see arm, dig high

name: Off Blocker Variation
focus: Focus on looking at attacker on defense
description: 5 defenders against 2 pin attackers.  Hitters self toss and attack.  Defenders release and attempt to dig ball.  Blocker in front of attacker blocks.
behaviors: Find hitter, see arm, dig high

name: Full D Self Toss and Defend
focus: Focus on looking at attacker on defense
description: Full defense against 3 hitters.  Hitters self toss and attack.  Defenders and blockers attempt to make plays on the ball.
behaviors: Find hitter, see arm, dig high

name: Self Toss and Defend Competition
focus: Focus on defending hitters.
description: 3 hitters against a back row defense.  Each side is competing to get the most digs.
behaviors: Release on toss, get set, pursue to ground

name: Set or Set Over
focus: Focus on reading setter set over or set to hitter.
description: Setter has option of setting a hitter or setting the ball over for an attack.  Defenders must make a play on the set over or release to defend the hitter.
behaviors: Read setter, follow ball to ground, release

name: Setter Attacking Deep Defense
focus: Focus on defending deep attacks from the setter.
description: Setter attacks deep to either corner.  Defenders make plays on the attack.
behaviors: See the attack, commit to defend, lift to middle

name: Step Collapse off Bowl
focus: Focus on emergency digging technique or step collapse.
description: Coach bowls ball to defender who uses step collapse technique to dig ball.
behaviors: Step outside ball, hip down, dig high

name: Team Mat Defense
focus: Focus on developing range with platform on defense.
description: Three players on their knees on mats defend against hitters.
scoring: Hitts +1 for hitting mat, Defenders +1 for digs
behaviors: Ready position, shoulders, dig high

name: Team Pepper
focus: Work on defensive movements and releasing on the set.
description: 5 players and a hitter (or coach) pass, set and defend repeatedly.
behaviors: Base, release, make a move, dig high

name: Two Hitter Variation
focus: Work on defensive movements and releasing on the set.
description: 3 back row players a setter and 2 hitters.  Players hit, dig and set repeatedly.  Hitter not attacking plays off blocker defense.

name: Dig and Cover Variation
focus: Work on defensive movements, releasing on the set and hitter coverage.
description: 5 players and a hitter (or coach) dig and then cover.

name: Touch Ten
focus: Effort on defense
description: Defender must touch ten balls attacked from a hitting line set up.
behaviors: Be ready, Pursue to ground, Find Shoulders

name: Free Ball Pass Variation
focus: Effort on defense
description: Defender must touch 10 balls off a free ball attack.

name: Back Row Attack Variation
focus: Effort on defense
description: Defender must touch 10 balls off a back row attack.

name: Ankle-Knee-Hip-High Passing Movements
focus: Work on passing movements from different heights.
description: Starting from ankle players get wide and shift hips left to right (and right to left), knee, hip and above hips are next.
behaviors: Ready position, shift hips, hold angle

name: 2-3 Passing
focus: Work on staying balanced on passing.
description: Off a toss, chip or 1/2 serve passers work on moving 1 foot then finishing with a 2-3 step movement before passing.
behaviors: 1-23, get balanced

name: Bowl, Down, Half
focus: Work on passing different types of balls.
description: Off a bow, down ball or hafl serve two groups of players pass, set and attack.
behaviors: Shoot early, eyes on platform, identify pass

name: Compass Passing
focus: Work on forming platform and passing from different areas and angles.
description: Using the compass as a guide players pass different combinations.  For example, NW - SE
behaviors: Ready position, shoot to ball

name: Free Ball Elimination
focus: Precision passing on free balls
description: Chip / bowl free balls over to passer, if pass if 'perfect' then passer stays in drill, if not perfect then they are out.  Continue until one passer is left.  Increase difficulty of free balls as rounds continue.
behaviors: Eyes on platform, pass with legs, freeze

name: Free Ball Relays
focus: Precision passing of free balls in a competitive setting,
description: Groups compete to pass free balls to a target.
behaviors: Shoot early, eyes on platform

name: Hi Pass / Low Pass
focus: Work on passing ball high and low on the body.
description: Off a toss players alternate between low (below hips) and high (above hips) passes,
behaviors: Ready position, shoot low / shoot high

name: Live Free Ball Passing
focus: Focus on precision passing of free balls
description: Off a tossed ball player gives a free ball over the net to be passed to the target.
behaviors: Side and drive, shoot early, freeze

name: Move Close/Away Pass Tight
focus: Focus on passing balls close to the body.
description: Toss goes to passer close to their body as they move toward the tosser or away.
behaviors: Shoot to ball, create space, go high

name: Off Balance Passing
focus: Focus on passing and platform contact without a solid base.
description: Passer on one leg.  Toss made to passer who passes and tries to stay on one leg.  Tosses make passer contact ball in multiple directions.
behaviors: Shoot to ball, freeze, eyes

name: Partner Passing Series
focus: Fundamentals of passing
description: Series of small contact drills where players focus on the technique of passing.  Tosser starts on 10' line, passer about 5' from end line.  Always pass toward the net.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot platform, freeze to target, eyes on platform

name: 3 Person Group Variation
focus: Fundamentals of passing and passing movements.
description: Groups of three toss and pass using different movements and types of passing.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot early, freeze, eyes on platform

name: One knee pass
focus: Shooting platform, freezing platform and eyes on platform
description: Passer starts with one knee on ground and hands in a ready position
behaviors: Ready position, shoot early, freeze, eyes on platform

name: Double knee drop
focus: Shooting platform, keeping hips under ball (low contact), eyes on platform
description: Passers starts in ready position, they lower hips and put their knees on the ground before contact.
behaviors: Ready position, hips down, freeze, eyes on platform

name: Shoot to Ball
focus: Shooting platform left and right
description: Passer starts in ready position, prior to toss players shoot thier platfroms to the left or right.  Tosser tosses to the direction of the platform.  Passer passes ball back to tosser.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot to ball, freeze, eyes

name: Shuffle Pass
focus: Dip and elevate
description: Passers starts in ready position, toss is made to their left or right (usually do in sets of one direction).  Passer shuffles and uses shoulders (dip inside shoulder) to get ball back to tosser.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot, shuffle, dip and elevate, freeze, eyes

name: Shuffle Pass Shuffle
focus: Dip and elevate, shuffle through ball
description: Passers starts in ready position, toss is made far enough where the passer will have to continue moving through ball in order to keep it in their midline.  Passers shuffles and uses shoulders (dip inside shoulder) to getball back to tosser.  Passer contiues shuffling through contact.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot, shuffle, dip and elevate, freeze, move to and through ball, eyes

name: Shuffle Lunge
focus: Shuffle, lunge step with outside leg
description: Passer starts in ready position, tosser puts ball in front of passer at an angle.  Passer uses shuffle and lunge footwork to get to ball.  Get hips and ball and extend platform.  Use shoulders to create angle back to tosser.
behaviors: Ready position, shuffle-lunge, angle, freeze, eyes

name: Run Throughs
focus: Shoot platform out, hips under ball, accerate to and through
description: Passer starts in ready position on end-line, tosser tosses ball up in front of them, passers must accelerate and run through balls
behaviors: Ready position, accelarate, platform out, hips under ball, backspin

name: Leg Lift Drop Step
focus: Passing high deep balls using specific technique
description: Passer starts in ready position, tosser puts ball high and deep off left or right shoulder, passer shoots platform out to ball, drop step and left back leg back to target.
behaviors: Read position, shoot to ball, drop step, lift leg to target, freeze and eyes.

name: Perfection
focus: Passing with pressure and precision
description: Two groups of four + passers.  Give free balls to groups, if the entire group passes ball to target (precisely) they get a point.
behaviors: Feet to ball, freeze, eyes

name: Platform to Target
focus: Work on angles to target
description: Players move around court to preset locations holding their platform to the target at each spot.
behaviors: Angle, freeze

name: Platform Skills Series
focus: Collection of contacts designed to give players a sense of how their platform works.

name: Two Ball Rapid Fire 3 Person Passing
focus: Passing quickly at different angles.
description: Two tossers and one passer.  Tossers quickly toss to passer in a pattern or randomly.
behaviors: Eyes, Shoot Early, Return to Ready

name: A-9 IFTE Progression
focus: Focus on setter seeing the movement of the middle to make decision
description: Setter at net, middle running and A, middle blocker on other side.  Toss ball, middle start approach for an A, middle blocker can either move with middle or stay in blocking base.  Setter calls out who they should set and catches ball (must call before catch)

name: A-9 Decision / Execution
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement and then executing
description: Setter at net, middle running and A, middle blocker on other side.  Toss ball, middle start approach for an A, middle blocker can either move with middle or stay in blocking base.  Setter sets A if middle stays or 9 if middle moves to block A.

name: A-9 Decision + Movement
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement with game-like transition moves
description: Setter transitions from back row, off a toss or free ball pass, setter must get to target and make correct decision based on the middle move call out and catch ball

name: A-9 Decision / Execution + Movement
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement with game-like transition moves and then executing
description: Setter or transitions from back row, off a toss or free ball pass, setter must get to target and make correct decision based on the middle move and execute the set (with hitters)

name: A-9 Free Ball Transition
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement with free ball transition and a live pass.
description: Setter transitions from back row, hitters transition from net.  Free ball to passer.  Passet to target.  Setter reads middle blocker and sets.  Hitters approach and attack.

name: A-9 Decision / Execution 1st ball 6 v 6
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement within controlled 6 v 6 play
description: Enter ball to one side, middle runs an A, right side 9, setter make correct decision and execute.  Play out points.  Alternate side getting first ball and repeat.  Side with most points wins.
behaviors: Side that wins point gets first ball.  Get a +1 for correct decision and/or +1 for winning point.

name: A-9 Decision / 6 v 6
focus: Focus on setter seeing movement within 6 v 6 play
description: Off serve, middle wll always run A, right side alway a 9.  Setter can set whoever they want (can set outside) but can only score off correct decision.

name: X or Z-4 IFTE Progression
focus: Focus on read of middle blocker
description: Setter must see middle blocker move and set away from it

name: 6-1-2 v 3-4-5
focus: Work on middle rotations
description: Two teams compete, one uses rotations 6, 1 and 2 (M2 front row) and the other uses 3, 4, and 5 (M1 front row)
scoring: Points, 2 points for kills from the Middle
behaviors: Force the middle, be available

name: 2 and 1 Transition Attacking
focus: Work on setting middles, attacking and transition attacking.
description: Using two setters middle hitter attacks multiple times.
behaviors: Be available, big first step, left arm up

name: Right T Variation
focus: Work on attacking from different areas of the court.
description: Starting from the Right T middles attack off two setters.

name: Free Ball Passer Variation
focus: Work on attacking off live passes.
description: Attacking off a free ball pass.

name: Half Serve Variation
focus: Work on attacking off easier serves.
description: Attacking off a half serve.

name: Blocker Tosser Variation
focus: Work on attacking against a blocker.
description: Tossers become blockers.

name: Around the World
focus: Transition attacking, middle fitness
description: Off a toss, middles approach and attack from different spots and angles.
behaviors: Big first step off the net.

name: Combo Hitting
focus: Transition attacking, varying approaches
description: Off a toss or free ball pass, middles approach attack, transition and attack, must hit two different sets
scoring: +1 for quality attack, or 2 quality attacks for +1
behaviors: Be available, big first step, left arm up

name: Deep Pass Middles
focus: Attacking off deep passes
description: Enter ball to endline area or beyond, pass to setter, middle attacks.
behaviors: Push inside 10', see pass, be in the air

name: Find the Ball
focus: Middles work on finding the pass and timing their approach
description: Toss to one of two passers, middles see pass and approach to hit quick attacks.
behaviors: See pass, find setter, find timing

name: Hit the Pass
focus: Timing and Attacking a High Tempo
description: Off free ball passers pass the ball up to the net near the target area.  Middles approach and hit the pass.

name: Hit Recover Overpass
focus: Work on recovering after attacking.
description: Middle Hitter attacks off a free ball pass, recovers and hits an overpass.
behaviors: Back to base, hands ready

name: HRBK
focus: Work on recovering to block after attacking.
description: Hitter attacks then most go block an attack on a box (left or right).
behaviors: Find base, find ball, hard move, press

name: In the Air Game
focus: Middles work on being available.
description: 6 v 6 where the other team scores if middle is not available (in the air) when setter has ball.
scoring: +1 for in the air, +1 for scoring a point
behaviors: Find ball, be available, left arm

name: Kill the Middle
focus: Work on transition footwork and conditioning for middles
description: Middles start on left pin, approach to coach and hit off toss, coaches takes one step back, middles repeat until they reach right pin
behaviors: Big first step off net, swing to score

name: Middles 10' line game
focus: Off speed attacking, transition
description: Alternating free / down balls, play inside the 10' line, middles must tip to score
behaviors: Approach to swing, see space

name: Midde Hitter Free Ball Competition
focus: Work on passing free balls and attacking.
description: Middle must pass free ball and attack 1st ball.
scoring: Points, Bonus point for scoring on first attack
behaviors: Feet to ball, platform or hands, control tempo

name: Middle Hitter Ball Control
focus: Transition attacking, middle fitness
description: Within 10' line middles must transition and attack continuously until goal is met.
behaviors: Be available, see defender, dig high

name: Middles off Down Ball Blocking Transition
focus: Transition attacking
description: Middle makes a block move toward a player giving a down ball.  After blocking the middle transitions and attacks.
behaviors: Big first steps, find ball, be available

name: Middles Serve Game
focus: Scoring points with middles serving and defending
description: Middles serve and play defense.  Switch between the rotations where the serve.
behaviors: Serve and get to base, talk about play, dig high, cover

name: Middles Serve Receive Score
focus: Middles work on reading and scoring passes to help with blocking decision making.
description: Server serves to serve receive.  When pass is made Middle Hitter calls out the pass score (0-3)
behaviors: Ready position, see contact, make a move

name: Middle Short Serve to Attack
focus: Middles attacking after passing a short serve.
description: Middle starts on T (left or right), server gives a short serve, middle passes serve and then attacks.
behaviors: Pass first, make time, be available

name: Rapid Fire
focus: Middles attacking with different timing and speeds.
description: Coach enters balls to passers.  Middle must approach and attack.  Coach changes speed of balls being entered to changing timing of attacks.
behaviors: See pass, call early, approach hard

name: Slide off Serve Behind
focus: Running middle offense off short serves behind setter.
description: Serves serve short behind and middles run slides.
scoring: +1 for a good serve, +1 for a quality attack
behaviors: Face target, finish behind, open shoulder, square, get in front, plant hard

name: Switching T's off SR
focus: Work on running middle attacks from SR starting positions.
description: Middles start on T and attack off a served ball.
behaviors: Move to start, be available, call loud and early

name: Zone 2 MH Attacks
focus: Work on running middles attacks when passes are in zone 2.
description: Coach tosses ball into zone 2.  Setter moves to ball and sets middle.  Middle makes call and attacks.
behaviors: See pass, call early, approach hard

name: Zone 2 MH Y/Z Option
focus: Work on running middles attacks when passes are in zone 2.
description: Middles run behind setter off a pass to zone 2.  Middles can audible between Z's (slides on pin) to Y's (slides inside).  Setter must recognize and adapt.
behaviors: Call loud, cut off the Y, beat the Z

name: Zone 3 MH Attacks
focus: Work on running middles attacks when passes are in zone 3.
description: Coach tosses ball into zone 3.  Setter moves to ball and sets middle.  Middle makes call and attacks.
behaviors: See pass, call early, approach hard

name: Zone 4 MH Attacks
focus: Work on running middles attacks when passes are in zone 4.
description: Coach tosses ball into zone 4.  Setter moves to ball and sets middle.  Middle makes call and attacks.
behaviors: See pass, call early, approach hard

name: 5 Ball
focus: Attacking off sets from all players.
description: Teams compete in 6 on 6.  Coach enters ball to player starting with Right Back.  The player contacting the entered ball must set to the Outside Hitter.  When a team wins a point the Coach rotates around until they win off each of the 5 players.
scoring: Win points off sets from all players to win
behaviors: Square to the outside, hold finish, wait for set

name: Attack from T
focus: Attacking out of system from the T (where the sideline and 10' line meet)
description: Two teams, first ball starts with outside hitter attacking from the T with no approach.  Hitter executes and standing step close, jump and attack.  Defensive team starts in out of system defense,
behaviors: Step close, high snap, deep 5

name: Beep Boop Bop
focus: Attacking out of system off a dig.
description: 3 players (Outside Right Side and Defender).  Coach hits to one of the players.  Players set and hit.
behaviors: Dig high, find the setter, 5 x 5, see the set

name: Three Hitter Version
focus: Attacking out of system off a dig.
description: 3 players (Outside Right Side and Middle Back).  Coach hits to one of the players.  Two hitters in each situation with Middle Back attacking out of the back row.  Players set and hit.
behaviors: Dig high, find the setter, 5 x 5, see the set

name: Full Defense Version
focus: Attacking out of system against a defense
description: 3 players attack off a dig against 6 defenders.  Attempting to create scoring opportunities.
behaviors: Dig high, find the setter, 5 x 5, see the set

name: Bop
focus: Recovering and adapting to an out of system situation.
description: Coach bounces ball and says 1 or 2.  The 1 or 2 indicates how many contacts the team has left to get the ball over.
behaviors: Be mean, 5 x 5, attack deep cross

name: Bounce and Adjust
focus: Attacking out of system balls with variation from an off the net angle.
description: Coach bounces ball to simulate out of system set, hitter approaches and attacks to deep zone 5
behaviors: See set, deep swing

name: Bounce, Hit and Dig
focus: Attacking out of system
description: Coach bounces ball to simulate out of system set, hitter approaches and attacks to deep zone 5, LB and MB players defending
behaviors: See set before approach, finish long to 5, dig high

name: Box Drill
focus: Defending and attacking out of system
description: Sets of 4, 1 to each back row player on each team, play out with back row players setting.  Hitters should be focusing on attacking deep cross.
scoring: Points per ball, or sets of balls for one point (give 5th ball if tied)
behaviors: Dig high, 5 x 5, Finish to cross

name: Ball Control Variation
focus: Defending and attacking out of system
description: Two teams of 4, playing cooperatively.

name: Serve Receive Variation
focus: Defending and attacking out of system
description: Two teams of 4 off a serve, competing within the box drill structure.

name: Box +1 Variation
focus: Defending and attacking out of system
description: Two teams of 5, adding a middle back defense, competing with in the box drill structure.

name: Broken Play Game
focus: Defending and attacking out of system
description: Coach tosses ball in to simulate 1st contact (a bad pass), teams play out the rally.
scoring: Points, bonus for scoring on first ball, bonus for scoring on 1st defended ball
behaviors: Loud call, find a hitter, see the set and make a decision

name: Broken Play Setting and Attacking
focus: Setting and attacking off bad passes
description: Coaches tosses balls to different locations on the court (pre set) setter runs to ball and sets hitter.  Hitter approaches and attacks.
behaviors: Platform to ball, lift in front of hitter, see set then approach

name: Bump Set Back Row SR
focus: Work on setting and attacking back row attacks on out of system balls.
description: Two teams of 6, toss ball in from endline to simulate first contact.  Make setter have move and bump set.  Set a back row player.  Play out rally.
behaviors: Platform out, get ball in front of hitter, wait to see set

name: Cross Court Setting
focus: Setting out of system balls from deep cross court
description: Coach bounces ball, player sets ball cross court to the pin they are facing then switch lines.
behaviors: Feet to ball, set over, 5 x 5

name: Inside / Outside
focus: Recognizing where the libero is before the 2nd contact.
description: Off a toss or a controlled free ball pass the libero will set a hitter.  If they are inside the 10' line they will use their forearms to set the ball, if they are outside the 10' line they will use their hands.
behaviors: Check the line, error to arms, 5 x 5

name: Deep 3rd Setting and Attacking
focus: Setting and attacking from the back 3rd of the court.
description: Off a toss to the deep 3rd of the court the setting player will give an out of system set to either the outsdie or the right side attacker.
behaviors: Make a good angle, See the set

name: Deep 3rd Competition
focus: Work on extreme out of system attacking and defending.
description: Teams compete starting off an out of system set from the deep 3rd of the court.
scoring: Points with Bonus Point for Scoring Off 1st Attack
behaviors: Make a good angle, See the set

name: Dig To Hit
focus: Work on out of system attacking
description: Players attack directly off of a dig
behaviors: Dig high, find ball, call ball

name: Dig to OOS Set
focus: Work on digging and out of system sets
description: Coach hits to defender, defenders digs ball, same defender must set an out of system ball for a pin attacker.
scoring: Points for quality sets and or attacks
behaviors: Dig high, feet to ball, finish high

name: In System / Out of System Wash
focus: Work on in and out of system offense.
description: Teams get two balls, one to the setter.  Teams must win both to score a point.
scoring: Wash scoring (win both points) for big point
behaviors: Freeze platform, call loud, see set

name: Middle Back Out of System Setting
focus: Work on out of system setting and attacking from middle back
description: Coach tosses or bounces ball to enter.  Middle back player sets hitter depending on the toss.
behaviors: Square to hitter, finish high, see set before stepping

name: Out of System Game
focus: Work on out of sytem offense.
description: Two teams, entered ball is played to the setter so the first attack is out of system.  Teams play out points.
scoring: Points, Bonus point for scoring off first out of system ball.
behaviors: Dig high, 5 x 5, Finish to cross

name: Out of System Hitting Lines
focus: Work on setting multiple hitters in out of system set up.
description: Hitters attack off a set from the libero.
behaviors: Feet to ball

name: Back Row Option Variation
focus: Work on setting multiple hitters in out of system set up.
description: Hitters, including a back row option, attack off a set from the libero.

name: Two Hitter Rotation Variation
focus: Work on setting multiple hitters in out of system set up.
description: Hitters from a two hitter rotiation work attack off a set from the libero.

name: OOS OT Attacking
focus: Work on out of system attacking focusing on shots over the block.
description: Off a dig and out of system set an Outside Hitter attacks over a double block to specifc areas of the court against a defender.
behaviors: See set, high contact, attack over

name: Out of Out of Sytem
focus: Work on out of system setting and hitting in extreme situations
description: Tosses to out of system setter that are extreme, last third of the court or off
behaviors: Feet to ball, square the angle, lift with legs

name: Two Person Out of System Setting Pit
focus: Work on out of sytem setting off of digs
description: Two players on the court with Coach hitting and tipping balls.  One player will play the first ball, the other will make an out of of system set.
behaviors: Dig high, hands or forearms, square to antennae

name: Pin-Pin-Pipe
focus: Work on creating out of system options in two hitter rotations.
description: Front row players with setter in right front, a libero in left back and a middle back player.  Ball is played to the setter.  Libero has the option of setting the left side, the middle back player or the middle on the right pin.
behaviors: Dig high, load to attack, call for availibility

name: Dig and Set from MB
focus: Work on out of system setting and attacking from middle back
description: Enter with ball to RB defender.  Middle back player moves to set.
behaviors: Square to set, finish high, 5 x 5

name: Hard or High
focus: Decision between forearm and overhead dig
description: Hitter on box hits ball either in front of defender or high.  Defender must decide to use forearms or overhead pass.
behaviors: Ready position, dig high, hands together

name: Back Row Defense Version
focus: Defensive movements and decision between forearm and overhead dig
description: Outside hitter and right side hitter on box.  Hitters initiate, defenders move.  Hitters hit balls for forearm pass or overhead pass.
behaviors: Base, release, finish high together

name: Seated Chest Pass to Fall
focus: Focus on contact point and finishing high while absorbing force.
description: Passer is in a seated position 8'-10' from partner who is on 10' line.  Tosser gives passer a chest pass to their face.  Passer overhead passes ball high to tosser, rocking back and absorbing force (finish on their back)

name: Standing Shoulder Lean Back
focus: Focus on contact point and finishing high while absorbing force.
description: Passer starts in ready positon 8'-10' from partner who is on 10' line.  Tosser gives passer a chest pass to their face.  Passer over head passes ball leaning back in their stance to absorb ball and finish high.

name: Serve to Face
focus: Focus on contact point and finishing high off a serve contact
description: Passer starts in ready positon 8'-10' from partner who is on 10' line.  Tosser serves ball to the passer's face.  Passer over head passes ball leaning back in their stance to absorb ball and finish high.

name: Shuffle Left / Right
focus: Focus on moving to ball and good contact for overhead pass
description: Passer starts in ready positon 8'-10' from partner who is on 10' line.  Tosser serves ball to the left or right of passer (2'-4')  Passer over head passes ball dipping outside shoulder to help them get ball back to tosser,  (Opposite shoulder motion as forearm pass)

name: Shuflle to Hop Back
focus: Focus on moving back to ball and good contact for overhead pass
description: Passer starts in ready positon 8'-10' from partner who is on 10' line. Tosser serves ball to move passer

name: Forward to Hip Drop
focus: Focus on moving forward, getting under ball for overhead pass

name: Cornered
focus: Work on getting the ball to the corner in different situations, from ideal or difficult.
description: Coach tosses ball Outside Hitter attempts to approach and attack to get ball into a corner.
behaviors: See sit, make a decision, force to corner

name: Dig Chase Swing
focus: Work on transition attacking and recovery attacking.
description: Outside hitter transitions to defensive position, digs ball, ball is tossed that the outisde hitter must chase down, then outside hitter attacks.
behaviors: Dig high, make space first, control directional step

name: Hit-Trans-OOS
focus: Work on the different types of attacking an outside hitter use.
description: Outside hitter hits from a loaded position off a set from the setter.  Hitter transitions and attacks again off a set from the setter.  Hitter transitions again and attacks off an out of system set from the libero
behaviors: Get on step, big first step off, see the set (OOS)

name: No Approach Attacking
focus: Work on attacking under difficult circumstances (without an approach)
description: Outside hitter starts on their last two steps (feet on ground).  Setter sets ball and outside attacks.
behaviors: Big Arms, High Snap, Long finish

name: No Approach Attack on 1st Ball
focus: Work on attacking under difficult circumstances (without an approach)
description: Outside hitter starts on their last two steps (feet on ground).  Setter sets ball and outside attacks.  1st ball is only attacked this way.  Teams play out the points after initial attack.
scoring: Points, Bonus Points for Scoring on 1st ball
behaviors: Big Arms, High Snap, Long finish

name: Shoot-1-2
focus: Work on attacking different tempos and locatons as an outside hitter.
description: Outside hitter hits a shoot off a free ball pass, then hits a higher set on the antenna and finishes with a set inside off the the antennae.
behaviors: Be on step, directional step

name: Sideline Bump Set Attack
focus: Work on attacking under difficult circumstances (out of system with a difficult angle)
description: Start with a bump set from the left side line (from the setter or libero).  Play out points.
scoring: Points, Bonus Points for Scoring on 1st ball
behaviors: Get wide, see set, keep ball between you and net

name: Outside Shot Butterfly
focus: Work on attacking different shots off a serve.
description: Outside hitter attacks 3 times in a row.  Tip down line, tip inside, roll shot to middle.
behaviors: Approach to swing, tip up and down, finish high and snapped

name: 2 v 2 SR
focus: Read server and use good technique to pass / serve to space and make passer move
description: 4 rounds with each players serving and passing.  Keep track of passing score.  High score wins.  Missed serves are 4 passes.  Change the number of serves (5-8-10)
behaviors: Finish to space, shoot early, eyes on platform

name: 3 In a Row
focus: Practice serve receive under pressure with a measure of quality.
description: Teams alternate serves.  Passing team must score 3 3 point passes in a row to win a round.
behaviors: Serve to space, shoot early, eyes on platform

name: 3 Pass Rotations
focus: Practice serve receive in rotations.
description: 2 teams of 6 in rotation.  Alternate serves.  Teams rotate if they get a 3 pass, stay if they do not.  1st team to rotate around wins.
behaviors: Talk before serve, feet to ball, shoot early

focus: Practice attacking and covering off serve receive.
description: Off a serve team receive.  If pass is a 3 or 2 pass then hitters can attack.  If pass is a 1 or 0 pass then hitter must to back to simulate a block and cover then attack again in transition.
behaviors: Good pass / bad pass, follow hitter, cover high

name: 15 in 5
focus: Practice serve in groups.
description: Groups of 3 receive 5 serves.
scoring: 0-3 points per pass, max of 15 per round
behaviors: Talk before serve, shoot early, freeze

name: 25 Swings
focus: Setting a standard for passing that allows us to run the middle
description: Servers and passers with middles attacking.  Encourage game-like serving.  Setter must force middle.
scoring: Quality attack = 1 point must get to 25
behaviors: Eyes on platform, see pass, be available, find middle

name: 25 Swings with Out
focus: Running offense on serve receive with an out option
description: Servers and passers with middles attacking.  Encourage game-like serving.  Setter has an out setting option.
scoring: Quality attack = 1 point must get to 25
behaviors: Eyes on platform, see pass, be available, find middle

name: Double Toss
focus: Work on passing a serve with a shortened read window
description: Two servers on end line.  Both will toss and one will serve.  Passers must react to served ball and pass to target.
behaviors: Eye movement, focus on serve, feet to ball

name: Find the Cone
focus: Work on preserve read
description: One server and one passer, server lines up to serve, passer moves to be in the path of the serve (read), serve and then pass.
behaviors: Look at foot, find the line

name: High Volumes Serve and Pass Lines
focus: Focus on generating a high number of serve and pass repetitions in a short amount of time.
description: Serve pass and target lines.  Server giving multiple serves to passer before rotating through.  The emphasis is on high numbers in a short amount of time.
scoring: Goal of serves or passes in a set amount of time.
behaviors: Palm to target, stay square, eyes on platform

name: Match the Angle SR
focus: Work on using different angles for the platform in serve receive.
description: Tosser gives three balls over the net to a passer, short, middle and deep.
behaviors: Ready position, shoot early, match angle

name: Midline or Lateral
focus: Read server and use midline or lateral pass
description: Servers serve 3 balls to pass, 1 on each lateral (left and right) and1 in midline
behaviors: Read before serve, shoot early, eyes

name: One Person SR
focus: Practice reading serves and covering area
description: 1 person in serve receive, 1 serve at a time  Only score off 3 passes.

name: One Person SR to Attack
focus: Practice serve receive with difficulty
description: 1 player in serve receive with a setter and hitter
behaviors: Read and step, see toss, 1 > 0

name: Protect the Passer
focus: Practice protecting a weak passer in serve receive.
description: Using a 3 person serve recieve, but only 2 passers, use a garbage can to be the 3rd passer.  Off live serves, the other 2 passers work on covering the as much area of the court as they can.
