behaviors: Lean and shade, shoot early, eyes on platform

name: Pin the Passer Variation
focus: Practice protecting a weak passer in serve receive.
description: Put the weak passer (can) on the sideline.

name: Protect the Passer Competition
focus: Practice protecting a weak passer in serve receive.
description: 2 teams compete serving and passing around the weak passer.

name: Read and Shoot 3 Person
focus: Practice reading serves before contact
description: Using a three person serve receive and two servers (one near each sideline), players must read serve, communicate where the believe the serve will go and shoot early to where they think it will go.
behaviors: Find the cone, shoot to read

name: Shoot left-shoot right
focus: Reading Server and Adjusting
description: Starting with a half serve (progress to full) players look at server who lines up either to the left or the right of the passer.  Passers shoot platform to the direction they read.  Once the read is made serve and then pass.
behaviors: Look at foot, look at shoulders, shoot early, adjust and freeze

name: Split-Shoot-Shift
focus: Developing a wide base and moving within it
description: Start in a ready position, players split their feet making a wider base, then shoot their platform, then move the hips from one leg to the other.
behaviors: Wide base, hold platform to target, shift

name: Speed SR
focus: Work on getting passer to focus on server quickly.
description: 1 passer and 3 servers.  Serve around passer.  As quickly as possible passer resets and receives serves.
behaviors: Ready position, look at server, make a read

name: 25 Point Serve Receive Game
focus: Work on passing in serve receive and understanding quality passes.
description: Groups of 3+, one serves and one passes.  Passes are scored on 0-3 scale.  Goals is to get to 25 points.  1st passing team sets time for 2nd team to beat.  Reverse serving and receiving.
scoring: 0-3 pts based on quality of pass
behaviors: Pre serve call, shoot early, freeze

name: Team Pass and Pound
focus: Work on passing and transitioning to attacking off a serve.
description: 3 person serve receive with a setter, passer that receives serve must attack on the net.
behaviors: Shoot early, eyes on platform, call loud

name: Varied Serve Off Box Serve Receive
focus: Work on passing with varied times constraints.
description: Servers on boxes at difference distances from the net.  Group of 3 must get goal of passing points to rotate out.
behaviors: Make a read, shoot early, freeze hands

name: 10' line serving
focus: Developing hand contact and control
description: With a partner, start on 10' line.  Serve three balls each and then back up a step.  Repeat until behind the endline.
behaviors: Palm up, keep serve flean

name: 25 point serving
focus: Work on serving under pressure.
description: Servers get points for making required serves and give up points to their ‘opponent’ if they miss their   serves.
behaviors: Big hand, Hold finish

focus: Changing and controlling hand speeds
description: Focus on changing speeds on the serve and learning the differences of applied force on the ball.  Players learn to feel the difference and apply slightly different levels of force onto ball.
behaviors: Set the speed, control the hand

name: Ace Them Off
focus: Developing aggressive serving and passing aggressive serves.
description: Teams compete against each other in serve and serve receive.  Receiving team accumulate points.  Teams switch when receiving team is aced or has a 0 pass (however you define it)
behaviors: Serve to space, hold finish, change speeds

name: Around the World Clear
focus: Work on serving to different areas of the court.
description: Two teams set up with six players sitting one in each zone on the opposite side of the net.  Players serve over net.  If a player can catch ball they come over and serve with their team.  First team to clear court wins.
behaviors: Stay seated, palm to target

name: Attack and Serve
focus: Work on serving after doing something on the court.
description: Player will attack off of a toss.  After attacking  player will go back and serve to zone given by coach.
behaviors: Run to service line, routine, see path

name: Can Ball
focus: Serving to a spot with trajectory
description: Teams of players serve into a ball cart or garbage can cart (with wheels), player can move to catch
scoring: Fill cart, # of balls for big point
behaviors: Palm to target

name: Cross Court Serving
focus: Serving angles.
description: Serving cross court short and deep.
behaviors: Angle, See the path, Palm to target

name: Criss Cross
focus: Serving deep angles.
description: Mark off corner areas.  Servers compete attempting to get as many serves into corner area as possible.  Server must serve on endline within marked area.
behaviors: Line up, toss in front, drive hand through ball

name: Diagonal Short and Deeps
focus: Serving deep and short angles
description: Using hula hoops or marks create short and deep angle spots.  Server must serve into both to score a point.
behaviors: Line up, focus on finish

name: Disruption
focus: Serving with the intent of disrupting the receiving team's offense.
description: Teams serve and receive.  Scoring is based on the 0-3 passing scale.
scoring: 0-1 pass = point for serving team, 2-3 pass = point for receiving team
behaviors: Serve to space, see path, focus on finish

name: Do Something Next
focus: Focus on the activities after the serve.
description: Players serve, get to base quickly and then pass a free ball.
scoring: Points for Serve and Free Ball Pass
behaviors: Serve and go, sprint to base

name: Game like Disruption
focus: Serving with the intent of disrupting the receiving team's offense.
description: Teams serve and receive using full serve receive set ups and serving order.
scoring: 0-1 pass = point for serving team, 2-3 pass = point for receiving team
behaviors: Serve to space, see path, focus on finish

name: Get to Base
focus: Serving and getting to defensive base
description: Players serve to a target and get to base as quickly as possible.
behaviors: Routine, serve and go

name: Full Defense Version
focus: Work on serving, getting to base.
description: 3 players, 1 serving, 2 in rotation ready to switch.  After serve players get to base.  Coach initiates a ball to simulate an overpass.
behaviors: Routine, serve and go

name: Hard-Hard-Soft
focus: Work on changing speeds from serve to serve.
description: Players serve balls in sets, using different combinations to work on transitioning from hard to soft serves.
behaviors: Finish to focus

name: High Serve / Low Serve
focus: Work on changing the height of serves.
description: Play serve balls in sets of 2, using different heights (top) of the serve.  1 serve should be high (define high) and 1 should be low (between top of net and top of antennae)
behaviors: Focus on finish

name: Hit The Pin Serving
focus: Serving to make the OH pass
description: Players serve attempting to make the OH or left passer contact the ball when pinned to the sideline.
behaviors: Line up to target, Palm to target

name: Hit Zone or Free Ball
focus: Serving to zones called in competitive situation.
description: Give server a zone.  Server serves.  If serve is in zone called play out point.  If zone is not in correct zone blow whistle and receiving team lets serve go.  Give receiving team a free ball to play out point.
behaviors: See path of ball, line up to target, hold finish

name: Hungry Hungry Hippos
focus: Serving and competing
description: In teams/groups/partners serving over net and catch 5 balls without dropping them.  Must come under the net with all the balls to score.
behaviors: Serve to catch, play defense, strategy

name: Flip Flop Serving
focus: Changing types of serves on back to back serves, working on being able to control the serve on successive serve to understand the differences.
description: Break court in half, two servers on end line, one passer and target.  Server alternates types of serves.  Repeat for 6, 8 or 10 serves.
behaviors: Breathe, See path of ball, palm to target

name: Let Serve Competition
focus: Work on serving flat and aggressive serves.
description: Teams serve counting the number of times the serve touches the top of the net and lands inside the 10' line.
behaviors: Drive through, finish long

name: Make'm Move
focus: Serving to space
description: Two teams, three peope in serve receive.  Alternate serves.  Teams score points for balls that the passers can not catch without having to take two steps.
behaviors: Line up to space, finish to space

name: Move or Free
focus: Work on making passers move in serve receive
description: Put lines on the court, if serve gets passer to move out of their line (forward or back) then play out point.  If the serve does not make them move then receiving team gets a free ball.
scoring: Points, Bonus point for making passer move and winning point
behaviors: Line up, change hand finish

name: Obstacle Course
focus: Serving to targets
description: Players must serve to differennt targets on the court
scoring: First through course or furthest along wins
behaviors: Palm to target, see the serve

name: Puppet Drill
focus: Serving to space / making passer move
description: Server with a passer on other side of the net.  Server must make the passer move.  Score points for making them move.
scoring: +1 for making passer move as dictated
behaviors: Line up to space, finish to space

name: Red Rover
focus: Serving to space
description: Two teams, three people on the court simulating serve receivers.  Serves have to serve a ball that the passers can not catch without having to take two steps (can take a lunge step but have to keep their pivot foot).
scoring: One team is loses all it's players or for time
behaviors: Line up to space, finish to space

name: Serve to Space
focus: Serve balls where passers would have to move to pass them.
description: Two teams, each team has passers and serves.  Alternating servers, if the team can serve a ball that can not be touched by passers (must keep one foot set) they score a point.
scoring: Points for serves that can not be touched.
behaviors: Line up to space, finish to space

name: Serve Behind
focus: Serving behind setter to disrupt offense.
description: Two teams with passers, servers and setters.  Teams alternate serves attempting to serve behind short behind setter.  Setter sets pass.
scoring: +1 for a good serve, +1 for a good set.
behaviors: Face target, finish behind, open shoulder, square

name: Serve Relay
focus: Serving under pressure
description: Competition serving drill where players serve and run to get balls.
behaviors: Routine, run, reset

name: Serving Points  +/+
focus: Serving flat to a specific location
description: Focus on being accurate while keeping ball flat (between top of net and antennae).  Serve a set number of serves to a specific location and keeping track of points.
scoring: Get points for each met objective (flat / location)
behaviors: Feet to location, hold finish

name: Serving Points +/+/+
focus: Serving flat and clean to a specific location
description: Focus on being accurate while keeping ball flat (between top of net and antennae) and contacting the ball cleanly (no spin).  Serve a set number of serves to a specific location and keeping track of points.
scoring: Get points for each met objective (flat / location / clean)
behaviors: Feet to location, hold finish

name: Situational Serving
focus: Serving to game like receive situations.
description: Subset of serve receive (with a middle) sets up.  On contact middle can release.  Server serves attempting to attack weakness of situation.
behaviors: See path, find a screen, use space

name: The Lonely Island
focus: Serving to space, Make passers move
description: Teams compete against each other trying to make passer with the most spce move.
scoring: Make passer move more than 1 step +1
behaviors: Line up to space, finish to space

name: X Before Y
focus: Serving under pressure
description: Serve X number of good serves before Y number of misses.

name: 012 Setting
focus: Decision making, match ups
description: 6 v 6 where the emphasis in on decision making from the settter and awarding points based on the number of blockers.
behaviors: Know your match ups, check your block

name: SR Trans Footwork
focus: Footwork for transition to target from SR
description: Set up in 1, 3, and 4.  Work on footwork for transtitioning to target.
behaviors: Shoulder to passer, ski hop into target, be balanced.

focus: Footwork for squaring up
description: Setters work on squaring up feet, hips and shoulders to outside antennae
behaviors: Square the right, antennae on right index finger

name: A / Set Over First Ball 6 v 6
focus: Work on decision making and reading middle blocker
description: 6 v 6 on first ball setter can either set an A (31) to middle or set over as an attack.  Playout the point after the first ball.
behaviors: Check middle, high hands, be available

name: Bounce and Set
focus: Work on moving to ball and setting to a target.
description: Setter starts in target.  They bounce ball off the ground, move and then set.
behaviors: Feet to ball, get square, hold finish

name: Bouncing Bump Sets
focus: Work on bump setting hitters with some chaos.
description: Coach tosses balls for setter to bump set hitters.  Move setter around to get them to set different hitters.
behaviors: Platform out, square to antennae, lift with legs

name: Blocking transition footwork
focus: Work on transition to target from block
description: Setter does a blocking move, when they land they must turn their right shoulder around to court while getting to target.  Make sure they setter does not take a negative step toward the sideline after they land.
behaviors: Right shoulder open, move to target.

name: Bump Setting Lines
focus: Work on bump setting hitters
description: Coach tosses balls for setter to bump set hitters.  Setters switch after each bump set.
behaviors: Platform out, lift and hold

name: Bumpin' Middles
focus: Work on bump setting middles
description: Coach tosses ball to setter, making them move out of target.  Setter must bump set the middle.
behaviors: Push the ball, be available, start your swing

name: Close to Far Setting
focus: Work on setting the ball different distances.
description: Starting close to the left pin coach tosses balls (set number) to setter who sets to target.  After set number Setter backs up.  Repeat until setter reaches other pin.
behaviors: Hand finish, speed of hands, hold finish

name: FR/BR Dig and Set
focus: Work setting off a dig and transition from defense to target.
description: Two setters, 1 in right back and 1 in right front.  Setters transtion from base to defensive positions.  Coach hits ball to either player.  Dig ball and other playet sets ball.
behaviors: Ready position, release on hit, get to target

name: Get Shorty
focus: Check blockers and decision making based on information
description: Blockers start bunched, after pass is contacted blockers move to their base, setter must set ball over smallest blocker
behaviors: Use the periph, see pass, see blocker

name: Kill the setter(s)
focus: Setting under pressure
description: With 1 or 2 setters (one is really hard), continous setting and hitting until hitters get a preset number of quality attacks.
behaviors: Get to target, hold finish

name: Free Ball Variation
focus: Setting under pressure
description: Off a free ball, setters set hitters to get a goal of quality attacks.

name: With Blocker Variation
focus: Setting under pressure with a blocking layer
description: Off a free ball, setters set hitters to get a goal of quality attacks with blockers.

name: Kills Variation
focus: Setting under pressure in a 6 v 6 structure
description: Off a free ball, setters set hitters to get a goal of kills against a full defense.

name: Team Competition Variation
focus: Setting under pressure in a team structure
description: Off a free ball, setters compete with thier teams to get a goal of kills in a set amount of time.

name: Low Pass / High Pass
focus: Adjusting sets to the speed of the pass
description: Using varying heights of passes and running quick tempo sets.  Setter must adjust speed of the set with the speed of the pass.
behaviors: Low to high, high to low

name: Long Set / Short Set
focus: Setting from different areas along the net.
description: Toss to different locations along the net while setter sets to the right side and outside.
behaviors: Feet to ball, hold finish

name: Off the Net A's
focus: Adjusting sets to passes off the net.
description: Moving the setter off the net and running A's (31's)
behaviors: Square to spot, keep ball in front of hitter

name: Out of Target Hitting Lines
focus: Setting multiple hitters from outside the target area.
description: Moving the setter around to set multiple hitters.
behaviors: Square, hold finish, know your options

name: Pass and Set from Behind
focus: Passing and setting from behind the target.
description: Passer takes a free ball from behind the setter.  Setter sets the pass.
behaviors: Lift, pass in front

name: Pin to Pin Setting
focus: Setting an increase distance to work on pushing ball
description: Setter start on right pole.  Toss ball at side line.  Player must set the ball across the net to the opposide pin.
behaviors: Hold hands, wait and fast hands, hold finish

name: Repetitions from Depth and Angles
focus: Setting balls coming from different places on the court.
description: Setter gets repetitions setting balls coming from different areas of the court.  10' line, mid court, deep court, left, middle, right
behaviors: Hands up early, square, hold finish

name: Dig or Release
focus: Reading attack and releasing to target
description: Two defenders, left back and setter in right back.  Hit ball to either left back or setter.  If the ball goes to left back setter needs to release to target and set ball.  If setter digs then left back should set.
behaviors: Ready position, See hit, release

name: Reverse the Flow
focus: Setting balls against the direction the pass is moving the setter.
description: Tosses to setter move them out of target either past mid court or behind them.  Setter will set against the flow of the toss.
behaviors: Midcourt change, push away

name: Run Through Sets
focus: Work on setting balls while moving through them.
description: Setters set balls whil moving from the target along the net.
behaviors: Finish high, transfer force

name: Setter Blocking Transition
focus: Work on setting a ball and then transitioning to blocking a hitter
description: Free ball to passer, setter sets outside and covers.  After coverage setter must recover and attempt to block an outside hitter attack.
behaviors: Follow set in coverage, get to base, hard move take space

name: Setting off Free Ball Passes
focus: Work on setting off live free ball passes
description: Coach alternates tossing in to free ball passers.  Setters set balls to left and right.
behaviors: Get to target, square, hold finish

name: Slides with Space
focus: Running slides as distance increases.
description: Tossing / passing balls in front of the setter and running slides.
behaviors: Wait and go, push ball past hitter

name: Sliding Knee Sets
focus: Emergency technique to gain confidence in using hands
description: Start in target.  Toss ball low.  Setter must move and slide under ball on their knees and set to outside.
behaviors: Hips down, finish high

name: SR Trans and Set
focus: Work on transitioning to net and setting from serve receive positions
description: Setter transitions to net. Coach tosses ball.  Setter moves to ball and sets.
behaviors: Sprint, open shoulders, see pass contact

name: Star Setting
focus: Footwork and reps from different spots on the floor
description: Set from different preset positions on the court.  Set from target in between each spot. (1-2-1-3-1-4-1-5-1)
behaviors: Square then set, hold finish, beat ball

name: Target Transition Setting (In and Out)
focus: Work on setting from transition and defense
description: Hitter on box hits to libero or setter.  Which ever does not dig takes the second ball.  Use a target for the setter and libero.
behaviors: Dig high, feet to ball, hold finish

name: Turn and look
focus: Reading middle blocker, using peripheral vision
description: Toss ball, when ball is in air, middle holds up 1 or 2 fingers.  Setter must look and call it out before they set.  Next level is 1 is outside set and 2 is back set.
behaviors: See pass, look, set

name: Zone 2-3 Switch
focus: Switching offense from zones
description: Toss ball into either Zone 2 or Zone 3.  Setter must switch the offense from the Zone they are in to the opposite.
behaviors: Feet to ball, sell the zone, quick switch

name: 6 v 2
focus: Competition with less than 12 players.
description: Team of 2 compete against a team of 6.

name: 6 v 2 Back Row
focus: Competition with less than 12 players with back row attacks.
description: Two teams compete, team of 6 can only attack from the back row.

name: 6 v 2 Ball Control
focus: Pass-set-attack chains with less than 12 players.
description: Groups work together to generate defined Pass-set-attack chains to reach a a goal.

name: 6 v 2 Tip to Mean Ball
focus: Defending and transitioning from a free ball.
description: Ball control drill where team of 6 must take a free / mean ball and turn it into a controlled attack.
scoring: Goal of defended / transitioned with one ball

name: 6 v 2 Tip to Attack
focus: Defending and transitioning from a controlled attack
description: Ball control drill where team of 6 must take a controlled attack and turn it into a controlled attack.
scoring: Goal of defended / transitioned with one ball

name: 6 v 3 Ball Control
focus: Pass-set-attack chains with less than 12 players.
description: Groups work together to generate defined Pass-set-attack chains to reach a a goal.

name: 6 v 3 Back Row
focus: Competition with less than 12 players with a focus back row attacks.
description: Two teams compete, team of 6 can only attack from the back row.
behaviors: Lead hitter, parallel swing, release on set

name: 6 v 0
focus: Team offense / defense / serve receive
description: Team of 6 executes specific aspects with a high degree of success required.
behaviors: Specific focus with low error expectation

name: 6 On Drills
focus: Work on differnt game situations on one side of the the net
description: A team of 6 exectues different game-like situations
behaviors: Vary depending on situation

name: SR To Attack
focus: Work on serve receive and serve receive offense.
description: A team of 6 receives a serve and generates a pass-set-hit.
behaviors: Pre-serve talk (passers and setters), shoot early, load to attack

name: Free Ball to Attack
focus: Work on free ball passing and free ball offense.
description: A team of 6 receives free balls and generates a pass-set-hit.
behaviors: Call free ball, get off net, push tempo

name: Defense to Attack
focus: Work of digging and transition offense.
description: A team of 6 receives an attack, team must generate a dig and transition attack,.
behaviors: Call hitter, hands up and over, dig high, big first step

name: Coverage to Attack
focus: Work on hitter coverage and transition to attack from coverage.
description: Team of 6 starts in hitter coverage, team must play ball and generate an attack.
behaviors: Creep in, hands out, high ball, make an approach

name: Read and React
focus: Work on recognizing situations and responding.
description: Player on side with coach enters balls by various methods (free ball, down ball, attacking).  Team of 6 must identify and react to situation attempting to get a pass-set-hit.
behaviors: Call situation early, release from base, find an attack

name: Serve to Attack
focus: Work on serving and transition attacking.
description: Team of 6 starts with a serve, team must make a transition attack off of different ball entrances.
behaviors: Line up to target, hold finish, talk about attack

name: Combination
focus: Work on a combination of situations.
description: Team of 6 must execute multiple situations and generate a pass-set-hit.
behaviors: Vary depending on situation

name: Simulated Game
focus: Work on a combination of situations to simlate competition.
description: Team of 6 competes in a simulated game using different situations to score points.
behaviors: Vary depending on situation

name: 6 On Flip Flop
focus: Work on playing in chaos
description: Team of 6 receives balls, after attack front row and back row players switch positions as ball is entered.
behaviors: Cover and replace, get to base first, talk about situation

name: 6 On Rotation Game
focus: Work on playing different positions in a team setting.
description: Team of 6 receives balls and must generate a pass-set-hit to rotate.
scoring: Rotations, quality attack, sets of attacks.
behaviors: Who is setting, find a hitter

name: Free / Down / Defend
focus: Work on moving from base to for different situations.
description: Team of six starts in base and moves depending on how ball is being entered.  Team plays out to an attack.
behaviors: Call situation, move from base

name: Pin Attacker Side Out
focus: Work on siding out off a serve with limited attackers.
description: Pin attackers attack against a full defense off a serve.
behaviors: Pass first, find a match up, swing to score

name: Pass and Jab
focus: Footwork for transitioning from passing to attacking and a pass first mentallity
description: From an adjusted serve (last 3rd of court) passer passes and makes jab step (2nd step).
scoring: +1 for pass, +1 for quality jab step
behaviors: Pass first, step-step, weight forward

name: Pass Jab to Step Close
focus: Footwork for transitioning from passing to attacking and a pass first mentallity
description: From an adjusted serve (last 3rd of court) passer passes and makes jab step and step close for approach.
scoring: +1 for pass, +1 for quality step close
behaviors: Pass first, step-step, step close

name: Pass and Get Past
focus: Focus on passing from middle and approaching outside of wing blocker.
description: From an adjusted serve (last 3rd of court) Outside Hitter passes and makes an approach attempting to get outside the wing blocker (either in front of or behind setter)
behaviors: Make a decision, step out, jump out

name: Pass and Pull
focus: Focus on passing from middle and attacking.
description: Outside hitter passes and attacks anywhere along the net.  Middle attempts to block them.
behaviors: Pass first, make a move and a call, step close

name: 2 v 3 (Contacts)
focus: Work on playing with constraints on the number of contacts a team can use.
description: Two teams compete with one time using 3 contacts and the other uses 2 contacts.  Situations are varied.
behaviors: Be available, talk about the set, find a swing

name: Bro Free Ball Setting
focus: Work on setting free balls with Liberos
description: Off a free ball Liberos set hitters.
behaviors: Feet to ball, make a decision (hands/forearms), keep ball in front of hitters

name: Changing Depth 2 Contact Attacking
focus: Work on setting to pins from different areas of the court.
description: Player in middle back court receives a free ball, that player sets the ball to a pin attacker.  Next ball is at a different distance from the net.
behaviors: Stay square, lift to pin, see set to step close

name: Continuous Approach Setting Ball Control
focus: Work on creative setting techniques.
description: HItters continuously approach and set each other attempting to keep the ball going for a goal of sets.
behaviors: Approach to ball, set in front of hitter, hold finish

name: Free Ball Set To Attack
focus: Work on creativity in offense off free balls.
description: Three front row players start on the net.  Coach gives a free ball.  Players transition off net.  Three players attempt to generate offense on two contacts (or 3)
behaviors: Hands up, call for set, finish to hitter

name: Go-Maha
focus: Work on generating alternative offense attacks.
description: Coach enters ball, receiving teams runs a Go play (1st contact is set) or Omaha (pass to hitter who approaches and sets)
behaviors: Call early, dig to set, approach set and hold finish

name: Hit on 2 Butterfly
focus: Work on attacking off 1st contact
description: Tosser enters ball over the net to one the 2 players.  1st contact is a set for 2nd player.
behaviors: Call early, move to approach, finish to set

name: Jump Bump Lines
focus: Work on creativity in offense with back row option setting.
description: Off a free ball pass a back row player approaches and then bump sets a pin hitter.
behaviors: Step close, bump left / right, hold finish

name: Libero Hitting Lines
focus: Work on creating attacking opportunities with the libero
description: Toss ball to libero, libero sets hitters (outside, middle and rightside).  If inside 10' line they must use their platform, if behind 10' line they can use their hands.
behaviors: In or out, set with legs, call out set

name: Mixed Vs.
focus: Work on problem solving and creativity
description: Teams are drawn randomly.  Teams will play with whatever line up they get (may be missing positions).  Teams compete off serve, free ball or down ball.
behaviors: Adapt, create a system, expand

name: Net Facing Quicks
focus: Work on setting quicks while facing the net.
description: Setter approach sets while facing the net.  Middle (or another hitter) hits a quick set to their left or right.
behaviors: Double arm lift, square, drop shoulder

name: Option Left
focus: Work on creative offensive plays.
description: Free ball pass to Libero or Middle Hitter.  That player sets Outside a 4 (32).  Outside can approach and hit or set the Middle on the pin behind them.
behaviors: Approach to set, Finish high, Cut behind

name: OOS Tip to 2nd Ball Trans Attack
focus: Work on creative offensive plays in transition
description: Start with an out of system ball to the outside hitter.  Outside hitter will tip.  Setter (or Right Back player) will set the tip to an attacker.
behaviors: Ready position, stay square and hold finish, call for 2nd attack

name: Pass-Hit Butterfly
focus: Work on generating attacks on 2 contacts.
description: Player passes an entered ball for other player to attack.
behaviors: Lift to net, find the step close, double arm lift

name: Pull Block To Set
focus: Work on outside blocker pulling when reading tips.
description: Off a self toss an attack tips.  Outside blocker pulls and sets tip to off blocker defender.
behaviors: See the slow, load to attack, square and side set

name: Pull Block to Set Butterfly
focus: Work on outside blocker pulling on tips and setting first ball.
description: Off a tip from an outside, outside blocker pulls to defender setting the left front player.
behaviors: First step, pull, square and side set

name: Setter Approach Set / Hit
focus: Work on creative offensive plays with setter options
description: Off a toss, setter approaches and makes a decision to attack with a set or set a hitter.
behaviors: Approach, turn, make a decision

name: Setter-Middle Option Attacking
focus: Work on creative offensive plays with a front row setter and middle.
description: Off toss, a setter and middle attack against a defense.
behaviors: Draw, find/create space

name: Tip to 2nd Ball Attack
focus: Work on creative transition plays
description: Off a tip from an outside hitter, setter sets first ball to the left side attacker
behaviors: Stay square to net, over the shoulder, see set and approach

name: Triangle Combinations
focus: Work on creative options with multiple players.
description: Off a free ball groups of the work on generating different pass-set-hit or pass-hit combination.
behaviors: Make a decision, call out options, double arm lift

name: Triple Option
focus: Work on creative offensive plays.
description: Free ball pass to Libero or Middle Hitter.  That player sets Outside a 4 (32).  Outside can approach and hit or set the Right Side Hitter or the Middle on the pin behind them.
behaviors: Approach to set, Finish high, Cut behind

name: Attack to Reset
focus: Work on transitioning to attack from different situations.
description: Team of 6 takes entered balls and pass-set-hit.  Multiple balls are entered in succession.
behaviors: Follow set, big first step off, be available

name: Hit Toss Hit
focus: Transition attacking
description: Hitter attacks, as soon as they land a ball is tossed over to a passer.  The hitter must transition and attack again.
behaviors: Big first step, pass high, reset approach

name: In Out Transition Pit
focus: Work on creating a transition attack off a dig.
description: Setter and Libero in back row with a hitter (OH, RS or MB).  Hitter on box hits to Setter or Libero.  Players must dig and create an attacking opportunity.  Group must get a set number of attacks to get out of drill.
behaviors: Dig high, feet to ball, wait for set.

name: Libero Free Ball Coverage
focus: Work on passing free balls around hitters.
description: Libero covers whole court for first contact of a free ball.  Hitters transition and attack.
behaviors: Feet to ball, open to passer, freeze

name: Overpass Dig Recovery
focus: Work on recovery when defense digs ball over net.
description: Team of 6 off a free ball pass-set-attack.  After attack when hitter lands Coach enters another ball.  Repeat.
behaviors: Find ball, lift to target, get off net

name: Reverse Flow Coverage Transition
focus: Work on switching the court in transition off a hitter coverage situation.
description: Team of 6 off a free ball pass-set-attack with either the Outside or Right Side.  When attack is made tosser puts a ball into play mimicing a blocked ball.  Team must pass set and attack with the opposite attacker.
behaviors: Follow set, get low, lift ball to middle

name: Rightside Dig Set Hit
focus: Work on setting and attacking for the Right Side attacker in transition.
description: Hitter hits ball to either right front or right back, player that does not dig must set, player who digs must attack the 3rd ball.
behaviors: Dig High, Feet to ball, Load to approach

name: Self Toss to Trans Attack
focus: Work on transitioning to attack off a dig
description: Outside and rightside alternate self tossing and attacking to the defenders.  If Setter digs ball that left player takes second ball and sets back row attack to middle player.
behaviors: Dig high, load to attack

name: Trans 2 or 3
focus: Work on transition offense and creativity
description: Coaches on boxes attack to defense.  Coach can give a hard driven ball or an 'easy'.  If hard driven team attempts to dig, set and attack.  If easy, then team attempts to generate offense on 2 contacts.
behaviors: Identify hard or easy, big first step, communicate 2 or 3

name: Transition Game
focus: Work on effort in transition
description: 6 v 6, if a player does not get past the 10' line in transition the other team scores a point.  Play out points, as long as players are transitioning past 10' line they can play to points conclusion.
behaviors: Big first step

name: Triple Block Transition
focus: Work on transition from a triple blocking situation
description: Three front row players execute a triple block as a down ball is entered (over the block).  Blockers land and transition to attack.
behaviors: Big first step, get off the net first, get back in the offense

name: Line Hitting Transition
focus: Work on transition from an attack hit down the line.
description: Two hitters on boxes (at each pin) alternate hitting balls down the line.  Block makes a move as ball is hit.  Transition off the dig to attack.  When hitting to setter, libero in left back takes second ball.  Blockers transition and attack.
behaviors: Release, ready position, dig high to middle

name: Middle of Court Transition
focus: Work on transition and attacking from a set in the middle of the court.
description: Starting from a block transition to attack off a set from the middle of the court.
behaviors: Get behind setter, square to pin

name: OOS Tip Back to Transition Attack
focus: Work on transition from coverage off an out of system attack.
description: Start off an attack to setter, off an out of system set hitter will tip back to coverage.  Team must transition from coverage to attack.
behaviors: Follow hitter, high coverage, be available

name: Recycle to Transition Attack
focus: Work on transitioning to attack off a recycled attack.
description: Off a free or down ball team will pass, set and attack.  With the attack the hitter will attempt to hit a controlled ball off the block.  THe team must transition and attack (full attack) off recycled ball.
behaviors: Angle up off block, cover high, be available

name: Self Toss Box Transition
focus: Work on transition attacking for in and out of system.
description: Off a self toss and attack teams of 4 dig and transition to attack.
behaviors: Dig high, big first step, see set then step

name: Serve Receive Tip Back to Transition Attack
focus: Work on transition attack off hitter coverage.
description: Off a serve players pass-set and hitter will tip back to coverage players.  After coverage team must transition and attack with a full swing.
behaviors: High coverage, get off net, be loud in transition

name: Dig and Hit to Double
focus: Work on transitioning to attack for an outside hitter.
description: Hitter on box.  Hitting to one of three back row defenders.  Dig and outside transitions to attack vs. a double block.
behaviors: Get set, dig high, get off net

name: Zero Attack Transition
focus: Work on transitioning to attack from a zero attack
description: Enter free ball to attacking team.  Attacking team passes, sets and gives a zero attack(non scoring attack) to defneding team.  Defending team must transition and score.
behaviors: Dig high, big first step off net, find a match up

name: 1 v 2
focus: Ball Control, Competing
description: Half Court, give down ball or free ball to 1 person side, player on 1 person side gets 3 contacts, play out.  If the 1 person side wins they get a point and get to stay, if they lose they have to wave off.
behaviors: Dig high, approach and attack

name: 10' Line Game
focus: Organizing Chaos
description: Play within the 10' line
behaviors: Dig high, talk about space, be offensive

name: Tag Team 10' line
focus: Warm up to competing with a larger group
description: Split in two teams, each player has a partner, one is in play the other on the 10' line.  When a player touches the ball they must switch with partner.
behaviors: Dig high, talk about space, be offensive

name: Ball Control Version
focus: Warming up with ball control
description: Two teams working together to reach a goal.  After each contact player must run.  Better with fewer players (3-4 on a side)
behaviors: Talk to attacker, contact and go!

name: Half Court Variation
focus: Warm up to competing with a smaller area of court.
description: Split into four teams.  Two teams play against each other in a half court.

name: Serve Receive 10' line game
focus: Warm up with serve receive
description: Start in serve receive, the serve uses the whole court, after the serve the teams play within the 10' line.
behaviors: Serve to space, talk about space

name: Setting Warm Up
focus: Forcing use of overhead pass
description: Same as 10' line game but players can only use thier hands (set / overhead pass)
behaviors: Ball control version (contacts)

name: 10' Ping Pong
focus: Warm up using one contact and competing
description: Teams compete within 10' line and using only one contact.  Players must switch out after contact.
behaviors: Talk about space, use angles, spring

name: Big Bounce Game
focus: Warm up using arm swing and ball control
description: One person on each side of the net on the court at a time.  Off an underhand serve players can pass the ball over the net before the ball bounces or use an armswing and bounce the ball on their side and then back over the net.
behaviors: Make a decision, feet to ball, use angles

name: Rotate Around Setter
focus: Adaptation / Communication
description: Play the position you are in on the court but setter is anchored and players rotate around them.
behaviors: Dig high, call early, make decisions about scoring

name: Rotation Game
focus: Adaptation / Communication
description: Play the position you are in on the court
behaviors: Dig high, talk about who is setting

name: Rotation Game +
focus: Adaptation / Communication
description: Play the positon you are in with serve receive and free ball
behaviors: Dig high, know your teammates, make decisions about scoring

name: Short Court Singles
focus: Work on ball control and strategy
description: Two single players within the 10' line compete off serve (from 10' line) using all three contacts.
behaviors: Three hits, control the height

name: Short Serving Game
focus: Compete within constraints
description: Teams with groups of three start with short serve
scoring: Points (only if there is a short serve)
behaviors: Finish palm up, hips under ball, settle first ball

name: Smashball
focus: Work on ball control, competitive play with different rules and limitations
description: Teams of 4 on each side.  Two front row players can only use an overhead arm swing to contact ball, two back row players can only use one arm underhand contact.  Teams get one contact to get ball over the net.
behaviors: Strategize, Front row / back row communication

name: Spike It Warm Up
focus: Work on ball control, reading and competing
description: Two teams of 3 competing.  Start off free ball, down ball or serve, teams pass, set and hit ball under the net.  Ball must hit in area inside hula hoop.
behaviors: Feet to ball, dig high, set with space, hold finish

name: Tag Team
focus: Compete and communicate
description: Teams of 4 with two on and two off the court.  When a player touches ball they must switch with teammate off the court.
behaviors: Touch and go, talk about space, dig high

name: Half Court Variation
focus: Compete and communicate
description: Teams of 4 with two on and two off the court play on half court.  More teams play on the other half.  When a player touches ball they must switch with teammate off the court.
behaviors: Touch and go, talk about space, dig high

name: Ball Control Variation
focus: Cooperate and communicate
description: Teams of 4 with two on and two off work together to achieve a goal.  After contact player must switch off the court with a teammate.
behaviors: Talk to attacker, dig high, touch and go

name: Tip Game
focus: Off Speed Offense / Defense
description: Off speed attacking only (can hit over pass or back row)
behaviors: See the contact.  Make a hard move to ball.  Be willing to hit the floor.

name: Wheel of Fortune
focus: Adaptation / Communication
description: Play the position you are in on the court / w more chaos.  Players rotate around until the free ball is contacted then players play the ball out from where they are in rotation.
behaviors: Call early, identify passer, get to positions quickly

name: Over under ping pong
focus: Work on small contacts, ball control and strategy
description: Two players within 10' line only (half court).  Players get one contact only on their side.  Players can hit over the net or under the net.  If ball goes under the net then the player gets one bounce, over the net no bounce.
behaviors: Ready position, find space, over or under

name: Pickleball
focus: Work on one armed contacts, strategy, communication and teammwork.
description: Teams of two starting off an underhand serve.  Players can use one arm (only) to get ball over the net on one contact. Teams are allowed one bounce on their side.
behaviors: Find space, talk about space, fill space

name: Ping Pong Competition
focus: Ball Control
description: Teams get one contact to hit ball over the net.
behaviors: Drop shoulder, drive ball

name: Random # Triples
focus: Organizing Chaos
description: Two teams, assign players numbers, call out random #s and play out for points.
behaviors: Organize and attack

name: Random # 6 on 6
focus: Organizing Chaos
description: Two teams, assign players numbers, call out random #s and play out for points.
behaviors: Organize and attack

name: Rapid Fire Reps
focus: Generate a high number of specific reps
description: Groups of 4 enter balls and use specific contacts rapidly.
behaviors: Vary depending on contacts

name: ROX - Rotation + Box
focus: Work on playing different positions in and out of system.
description: Teams of six players with players playing the position they are in on the court (no switching).  Teams get two balls one two left back or middle back and one to right back (the setter).
behaviors: Who is setting, find a match up, feet to ball

name: Run Through Pass-Set-Hit
focus: Work on pass-set-hit chain from a run through
description: Coach tosses ball for player to run through and pass.  After passing  players will set and then hit.
scoring: Group must go through without a hitting error
behaviors: Platform out, hips under ball, run through

name: Speed ball
focus: Compete with high number of repetitions
description: Split court in half, teams of two, with extra teams on end line.  Enter ball and play out, winning team stays on court, losing team rotates off.
behaviors: Be offensive, dig high, release to set

name: Spike It
focus: Compete under constraints
description: Using a hula hoop as a target, players pass-set and attack into the hula hoop.  Ball must still land in court off bounce to be in.
behaviors: Read and react, go high, find a shot

name: Team Down Ball Competition
focus: Compete while focusing on down ball / armswing technique
description: Two defenders + 1 setter at net.  Players compete against other team but can only hit down balls.
behaviors: Feet to ball, finish high and long

name: No Jumping Game
focus: Compete without jumping.
description: Two teams compete.  Players pass set and hit down balls.
behaviors: Set the block, feet to ball, finish high

name: Short vs Half
focus: Compete with varying court shapes.
description: Two teams compete, one on a short court the other on a half court.

name: No Setter 3's
focus: Compete without setters.
description: Teams of three compete.  If MB or RB passes then LB sets.  If LB Passes then RB sets.
behaviors: Dig high, see set, lead hitter

name: Triangle Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts with position roles

name: Square Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts with position roles

name: OH/MH Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts with two hitters

name: OH/RS Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts with two hitters

name: Short / Deep Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts and front to back seam

name: 3 Deep Middle Pass-Set-Attack
focus: Work on 3 contacts from back row to front row

name: Rapid Fire
focus: Work on 3 contacts continuously.
description: Tosser enters ball.  Team attempts to pass-set-hit ball over.  When 3rd contact is made tossers gives another ball.
scoring: 0 pts for free ball, 1 pt for down ball, 2 pts for jump and swing.
behaviors: Call lout first contact, pass high, recover

name: Varied Triples
focus: Work on 3 contacts with changing roles.
description: Coach enters ball to team of 3.  Depending on who contacts the 1st ball the other 2 players have assigned roles.  Enter 3 balls, one to each player so they have to does every skill.  Players rotate after 3 balls.
scoring: 0 pts for free ball, 1 pt for down ball, 2 pts for jump and swing.
behaviors: Call 1st ball, setter get to net, hitter call for set

focus: efwegrergw

behaviors: gregrgregwgtw
